Jenylyn is asking to take a loan to buy more piglets to raise and animal feed. A loan will help her improve her hog raising business, thus augmenting her income and profits. Jenylyn dreams of expanding her business and also saving money for her children’s schooling.

loans.use: to buy more piglets to raise and animal feed.

loans.name: Gina

texts.en:
Gina is a 34-year-old married mother of 2 children from Ormoc City, Leyte. She runs a small sari-sari or retail store business in her area. She sells various goods like snack foods, toiletries, and cooking ingredients, amongst others. 

Gina would like to take a loan to buy more groceries to sell such as canned goods, noodles, soda and beverages, soap and toiletries, cooking oil, condiments, rice, bread, and biscuits. 

This loan will enable Gina to increase her stock and thus attract more buyers to her store.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to sell such as canned goods, noodles, soda and beverages, soap and toiletries, cooking oil, condiments, rice, bread, and biscuits.

loans.name: Habiba

texts.en:
Habiba is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a fishing business in the Philippines. She is borrowing PHP 30,000 through NWTF to buy additional fishing net for her fishing business.

Habiba has been in this business for 10 years. She also earns more income from fish vending. She has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional fishing net.

loans.name: Maria Guadalupe

texts.es:
María, utilizo el crédito anterior para continuar teniendo la venta de semilla de marañón surtida, de esta manera sigue teniendo los ingresos necesarios para ir mejorando su estilo de vida, ella ha cambiado de domicilio en busca de mejores oportunidades de desarrollo social.
Nuevamente hace la solicitud de un crédito para comprar semilla de marañón cruda al mayoreo, así su inventario estará surtido y abastecerá a sus clientes, espera tener buenos resultados como con el préstamo anterior.
texts.en:
María used her previous loan to continue selling cashew nuts. This allowed her to continue generating the necessary income to improve her lifestyle. María moved into another house so that she could have better opportunities for social development.

She is requesting a loan once again so that she can buy raw cashew nuts in bulk. This will allow her to have a well-stocked inventory so that she can supply her customers. María hopes to achieve good results, just like her previous loan.

loans.use: to buy raw cashew nuts in bulk.

loans.name: Benson

texts.en:
Benson lives on a hilltop in Litein, Kenya with his family. From his house he can see a bright future, thanks to the income he earns through practicing mixed farming. Benson passionately loves dairy farming and has nicknamed one of his cows. Because of his immense farming knowledge, he has trained more farmers in the hope that they will replicate his model in their own farmland. 

The biggest challenge he faces, however, is satisfying the demand for milk in his village. The demand is overwhelming. He is seeking a loan to buy another dairy cow. He believes that through the loan he will be able to improve his living conditions and be able to secure the future of his family. 

Having gone through training with Juhudi Kilimo, he is confident that the skills he acquired will help him increase his business and be able to pay back the loan. Benson is confident that if you invest in his dream, you will be impacting the life of his family. Kindly invest in this honest and admirable young man.

loans.use: to buy a quality breed of dairy cow.

loans.name: Javith Enrique

texts.es:
Javith es padre de una pequeño hija de 1 año de edad y por la cual ha luchado incansablemente para sostenerla y brindarle todo lo que necesita.

Encontró en la venta de mercancía como artículos para el aseo personal, la manera para generar buenos ingresos estando cerca  de su hija y su esposa.

Hoy en día está iniciando con un capital muy pequeño y está en etapa de recolección de clientes, por esta razón solicita un préstamo para la compra de surtido de productos como cremas de manos, desodorantes, lociones, enjugues, entre otros, al por mayor y así poder abastecer su pequeño negocio con productos de calidad.

Con la ayuda del préstamo podrá impulsar su negocio y tendrá una mejor variedad de productos para ofertar, logrando así la consolidación de su negocio.
texts.en:
Javith is the father of a small, one year old daughter for whom he has struggled untiringly to sustain and offer everything she needs.
He found in the sales of merchandise, such as articles of personal hygiene, the way to make good income while being close to his daughter and wife.
These days, he is starting with very little capital and is at the stage of collecting from his customers.  For this reason, he is requesting a loan to purchase an assortment of products such as hand creams, deodorants, lotions, wipes, among other things at wholesale so he can stock his little business with quality products.
With the help of the loan, he will be able to push his business forward and will have a greater variety of products to offer, thus attaining the consolidation of his business.

loans.use: to buy an assortment of products such as hand creams, deodorants, lotions, wipes, among other things.

loans.name: Lucy

texts.en:
Lucy is a 50-year-old woman, who is married with six children. She owns and operates a business of tailoring clothes and sells them to her clients to earn a living. She has five years experience in this line of business.

Lucy needs a loan to buy an electric sewing machine, a roll cloth material, and she will use the other part of the loan to buy timber to improve her house. She hopes to use her profits to invest in her business, as well improve the standard of living for her family. She has been a SPBD member since 2013.

loans.use: to buy an electric sewing machine, a roll cloth material and to buy timber to improve her house.

loans.name: Grace

texts.en:
Grace is a 32-year-old, married woman and a mother of four children. The eldest is 13 and the youngest child is 3. Grace makes a living through her sari-sari or variety store. She has been in the business for more than 10 years now. She also earns an additional income hog raising. 

Grace is asking to take a loan to buy more groceries to sell like canned goods, noodles, soda and beverages, soap and toiletries, cooking oil and condiments, bread and biscuits, and also additional piglets to raise. Grace believes that through a loan she will be able to improve her business as well as her income.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to sell like canned goods, noodles, soda and beverages, soap and toiletries, cooking oil and condiments, bread and biscuits, and also additional piglets to raise.

loans.name: Imelda

texts.en: Imelda is a 45-year-old, married woman and a mother of four children. She lives with her family in the town of Ormoc City, Leyte. She is engaged in rice retail business. This has been her source of income for more than 10 years now. Imelda would like to take a loan to buy more rice and fertilizer. She is optimistic that a loan she will get will help improve her business as well as her income.

loans.use: to buy more rice and fertilizer.

loans.name: Adama Awa's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe est créé depuis 2009,il regroupe des membres qui sont solidairement liés par une responsabilité de remboursement de leur crédit.

Fatou qui se trouve à droite de la photo et levant le bras est notre emprunteuse vedette,elle est âgée de 55 ans,elle est mariée et mére de 05 enfants dont 02 garçons.

Elle achéte et revend de l'huile de palme,elle fait aussi du maraîchage.

Avec le prêt,elle compte acheter de l'huile de palme pour une valeur de 150000f et les 50000f restant  de l'engrais pour son jardin.

Les bénéfices liés à son activité serviront à augmenter son épargne.
texts.en:
This group has been in existence since 2009. Its members maintain a spirit of solidarity and share the responsibility for repaying their loan. Fatou, the one on the right raising her hand in the photo, is our star borrower. She is 55 years old, married, and has five children, two of them sons. She buys and resells palm oil and also grows garden vegetables.

With this loan, she plans to buy palm oil for 150,000 West African francs, and use the remaining 50,000 francs for fertilizers to use in her garden. Her revenues will allow her to grow her savings.

loans.use: to buy palm oil [for resale].

loans.name: Jeny

texts.en:
Jeny is a merchant from Ormoc City, Leyte. She is 42 years old, married, and has 9 children. She runs a small sari-sari or retail store selling various goods and food items to the people in her area. She has been in this business for several years now. 

Jeny is requesting a loan to buy more groceries to sell such as canned goods, noodles, soda and beverages, soap and toiletries, cooking oil, and condiments amongst others. 

Jeny believes that a loan will help her improve her business as well as her income. She wishes to save some of her earning to pay for her children’s school fees.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to sell such as canned goods, noodles, soda and beverages, soap and toiletries, cooking oil, and condiments amongst others.

loans.name: Emprendedoras Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Emprendedoras está en su ciclo número 9 del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas trabajan y se ayudan por salir adelante. Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Margarita, quien vende cosméticos, también se debe destacar el trabajo y la lucha de todas las integrantes. Es una mujer muy trabajadora y luchadora que quiere poder crecer y dar a su familia todo lo que ella no pudo tener. Margarita está recibiendo capacitaciones para poder conocer la mejor forma de invertir su dinero y llegar a ver luego los frutos de su esfuerzo.
La Señora solicita de este préstamo para la compra de sus cosméticos variados, lo que le ayudará a concretar su plan de negocio, y así a mejorar sus ingresos y también poder cumplir con la demanda de sus clientes.
texts.en:
The group named “Emprendedoras” is in its ninth loan cycle with the Women’s Committee Program. All of the members are working and helping one another to move forward. One of the members is Sra. Margarita, who sells cosmetics. However, the work and determination of all the members should be noted.

Margarita is a hardworking and determined woman who wants to grow and provide her family with everything that she wasn’t able to have. With the training she has received, Margarita has learned the best way to invest her money so that she can later see the fruits of her effort.

Sra. Margarita is requesting a loan in order to buy various cosmetics so that she can solidify her business plan. This will improve her earnings, but also allow her to fulfill the demands of her customers.

loans.use: to buy various cosmetics to sell.

loans.name: Akuavi

texts.fr: Akuavi est une femme mariée âgée de 35 ans. Elle vit avec son mari dans le quartier d’Adidogomé. Akuavi désire contribuer activement à l’épanouissement de sa famille en faisant la couture des habits. Cette activité lui génère un gain favorable afin de venir en aider à son mari. Akuavi s’approvisionne une fois par mois au marché local. Pour acheter les rouleaux de popeline, Akuavi sollicite ce crédit pour son financement et réaliser plus de bénéfice.
texts.en: Akuavi is a 35-year old married woman. She lives with her husband in the Adidogomé neighborhood. Wishing to actively contribute to the well-being of her family, Akuavi sews clothing for sale. This allows her to earn a revenue and help her husband with expenses. Akuavi stocks up once a month at the local market. In order to finance purchasing rolls of poplin, Akuavi is seeking this loan, which will enable her to earn a higher revenue.

loans.use: to buy two rolls of poplin and one roll of interlining.

loans.name: Huma

texts.en:
Huma is an energetic young lady who is well trained in sewing clothing. She belongs to a middle class family and wants to support her family through her own abilities. 

This is the reason why Huma has been running a small boutique where she earns an income. Her husband also supports and encourages her profession by buying different varieties of designer cloth which Huma sews into unique and attractive dresses. Society ladies like Huma's dress collections very much, which is why her business is doing very well. 

Huma needs to purchase more cloth and stitching material to increase her boutique's business. Thus she is requesting a loan from Kiva and its field partner BRAC Pakistan. She is thankful to Kiva's lenders

loans.use: to purchase cloth and increase her boutique's business.

loans.name: Nav's Group

texts.en:
Nav, 36, lives in Punhea Krek district of Kampong Cham province. She is a mother of four dependent children. Moreover, the four of them are still studying in high school. She struggles for a living via growing rice and cassava as the main sources of income, and she is also working for others for a fee to supplement her family’s income. 

This is her fourth time with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) and she has fully repaid her past loans. In a group of two members, she is a group leader. She will spend her loan portion to buy fertilizer and to plow the field to grow cassava. She hopes that she can improve her farmland to get more yield to get more income.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and to plow the field to grow cassava.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ponhea Krek district

loans.name: Diego Alejandro

texts.es:
Diego es un joven campesino de 21 años de edad, trabajador y humilde, que desde niño aprendió a realizar todas las labores del campo, gracias a las enseñanzas de sus padres. 

Esto le ha permitido progresar y, hoy en día posee cultivos de frutas, cultivos que atiende todos los días y las cosechas son vendidas en la plaza de mercado del municipio de Dabeiba, adicionalmente, realiza labores de jornalero en diferentes fincas de la región, pues con ello complementa los ingresos con los que vela por el bienestar de sus padres que tanto lucharon para sacarlo adelante. 

Con el apoyo del crédito solicitado en la Corporación Interactuar, comprará insumos agrícolas al por mayor como abonos, pesticidas, fertilizantes y otros, con esto seguirá cuidando sus cultivos y tendrá una mejor cosecha, más productiva y asi mejorará los ingresos a la hora de vender sus productos.

Diego, con su espíritu emprendedor, su pujanza y tenacidad, quiere seguir luchando para cumplir el sueño de tener una finca propia, en la que pueda cultivar mucha más variedad de productos y así mejorar la rentabilidad del negocio, garantizando una estabilidad económica para su familia.
texts.en:
Diego, 21, is a young farm worker who is hardworking and humble and who learned how to carry out field labor from childhood thanks to the teachings of his parents.
This has allowed him to progress and nowadays he has fruit crops that he tends every day and the harvests are sold in the plaza of the municipal market of Dabeiba.  In addition, he does work as a day laborer in different farms in the region.  So with that, he complements the income with which he watches out for the welfare of his parents who struggled so much to help him get ahead.
With the support of the loan requested from the Interactuar Corporation, he will buy agricultural supplies wholesale such as manure, pesticides, fertilizers, and other things.  With this, he will continue caring for his crops and he will have a better, more productive harvest and thus improve his income when he sells his products.
Diego, with his enterprising spirit and his vigor and tenacity, wants to continue struggling to complete his dream of owning his own farm on which he will be able to cultivate a greater variety of products and thus improve the liquidity of his business, guaranteeing economic stability for his family.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies wholesale such as manure, pesticides, fertilizers, and other things.

loans.name: Francisca

texts.es:
La Sra. Francisca es de la ciudad de Encarnación, tiene su negocio de distribución y venta de electrodomésticos, ya tiene una buena clientela que siempre va a su local, es por ello que le esta yendo muy bien y crece poco a poco, comenta que su préstamo anterior lo uso para la compra de electrodomésticos que le fue de mucha ayuda.
Hoy pide este préstamo para poder arreglar su local comercial, y con ello poder mejorar sus ventas y atención a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Sra. Francisca is from the city of Encarnación. She has a business where she distributes and sells household appliances. She has a good clientele that is always coming to her shop. For this reason, she is doing very well and is growing a little bit at a time. Francisca says that her previous loan was used to buy household appliances, which was a great help.

Today she is requesting this loan so that she can repair her shop. This will help to improve her sales and the service to her customers.

loans.use: to make repairs to her shop.

loans.name: Fabiola Jalicsa

texts.es: FABIOLA JALICSA: Es una joven alegre y cordial de 25 años de edad, originaria de Waspam Río Coco, casado con un pequeño hijo de 3 meses. Es un microempresaria, con 8 años de experiencia como pequeña comerciante. Está solicitando su primer financiamiento para aumentar el inventario de los productos de granos básicos, gaseosas, detergentes, papel higiénico, sopas instantáneas, entre otros, que vende en su  pulpería. Su sueño es llegar a tener una distribuidora de productos que le genere más ganancia y poder  crear las condiciones que le permitan a ella y a su familia tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Fabiola Jalicsa is a cheerful and cordial young woman who is originally from Waspam Rió Coco. She is 25 years old, married, and has a three-month-old son.

Fabiola is an entrepreneur who has eight years of experience as a small business owner. She is requesting her first loan in order to increase her inventory of products such as basic grains, sodas, detergents, toilet paper, instant soups, and other items to sell in her grocery store.

Her dream is to have a product distribution center where she can generate more income and create conditions that will enable her and her family to have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, sodas, detergents, toilet paper, instant soups, and other items to sell in her store.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: buy condiments.

loans.name: Carlos

texts.pt:
O senhor Carlos tem 35 anos de idade, é casado e  pai de 1 filha de 9 anos de idade e vive  na casa própria. Além da sua família sustenta a sua mãe e irmã enviando, vive na casa propria. 
Diz que com o valor do empréstimo irá comprar cimento, varões, chapas de zinco e portas para ampliar a sua casa com mais um quarto e uma cozinha.
Seus sonhos e esperanças para o futuro são terminar a sua casa, mobilar, vedar com um murro e adiquirir uma viatura para uso pessoal.
Diz que tem como desafios insuficiência de   fundos  e para ultrapassar esta situação faz uma poupança e irá efectuar os pagamentos nas datas acordadas e solicitar mais créditos para concretizar o seu plano.
texts.en:
Carlos is 35 years old, married, father to a 9 year old daughter and lives in his own home. As well as supporting his family he also sends money to support his mother and sister who live in their own home.

Carlos says that with the money from this loan he will buy cement, rods, zinc sheeting and doors to expand his house by adding another room and a kitchen.  

His hopes and dreams for the future are to finish building his home, furnish it, seal it with a wall and acquire a vehicle for personal use. 

Carlos says that his challenge is having insufficient funds. To overcome this situation he will set aside savings, make repayments in the agreed times and apply for more loans to cement his plans.

loans.use: to buy cement, rods, zinc sheeting and doors

loans.name: San Antonio Group

texts.es:
El grupo San Antonio y está en su 1er ciclo  del programa de comité de mujeres, es un grupo nuevo, donde las integrantes tienen las expectativas de poder crecer y mejorar, es por ello que forman parte del programa de eliminación de la pobreza.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Ancelmina, quien en su  encuesta mostró un nivel de pobreza dentro del nivel uno, lo que quiere decir que se encuentra en una pobreza extrema. Entre el trabajo que ella hace, comenta que se dedica en la venta de Lencería, y que con su trabajo lucha para poder tener los medios para ayudar a su familia La señora Ancelmina trabaja con la fundación desde el año  2014. Se caracteriza por ser una mujer emprendedora, es creativa y es capaz de emprender un negocio y tener éxito.
Pide este préstamo para la compra de lencería para la venta, lo que le permitirá poder seguir con sus ventas como lo viene haciendo, luchando por crecer.
texts.en:
The group “San Antonio” is in its first loan cycle with the Women’s Committee Program. This is a new group in which all of the members have expectations of growing and improving. For this reason, they are also participating in the poverty elimination program.

One of the members is Sra. Ancelmina, whose survey indicated that she is at a Stage 1 poverty level. This means that she is in extreme poverty. Ancelmina says that she sells lingerie in order to make her living. Through her work, she is able to have the means to help her family. Sra. Ancelmina has been working with Fundación Paraguaya since 2014. She is known for being an enterprising and creative woman who is capable of starting a business and being successful at it.

Ancelmina is requesting a loan in order to buy lingerie to sell. This will enable her to continue her sales just as before. She is also striving to grow.

loans.use: to buy lingerie to sell.

loans.name: Porvenir Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Porvenir está en su ciclo número 2 del programa de comité de mujeres, es de la ciudad de Concepción, la cual es una zona un poco alejada de la zona céntrica y aun se encuentra en crecimiento. Es una zona de difícil acceso, por lo que todas están luchando y creciendo.
La Sra.  Hermelinda es una de las integrantes, ella es vendedora de todo tipo de productos, como ropas, zapatillas, accesorios nuevos o usados. Desea que conforme pase el tiempo, y por medio de su trabajo y esfuerzo y sumado a las capacitaciones que irá recibiendo vaya mejorando su calidad de vida.
Pide este préstamo para la compra de prendas varias, y calzados, de manera a poder seguir con su esfuerzo y su sacrificio para poder ayudar a su familia.
texts.en:
The group named “Porvenir” is in its second loan cycle with the Women’s Committee Program. The members are from the city of Concepción, which is in an area that is a bit far from an urban center, but yet it is in a growth period. This area is difficult to access, but all of the members are striving and growing.

Sra. Hermelinda is one of the members. She sells all types of products such as clothes, slippers, and new and used accessories. As time passes, Hermelinda hopes that her work, effort, and training will result in an improved quality of life.

She is requesting a loan in order to buy various clothes and shoes. This will enable her to continue helping her family through effort and sacrifice.

loans.use: to buy various clothes and shoes to sell.

loans.name: Antonio

texts.es:
Antonio está en el 4to. Año de la carrera de Kinesiología, con mucho sacrificio está alcanzando su meta de recibirse y poder trabajar en su profesión.
Antonio es una persona luchadora que se esfuerza por sus ideales y que esta poniendo todo de sí para poder lograrlo.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su carrera y con ello poder seguir con sus estudios como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
Antonio is in his fourth year of study toward a degree in Kinesiology. With great sacrifice, he will be able to reach his goal and begin working in his profession.

Antonio is a determined individual who strives to achieve his ideals, so he does everything he can to accomplish this. He is requesting this loan so that he can pay his degree fees. This will allow him to continue his studies just as before.

loans.use: to pay his university fees.

loans.name: Ambrocia

texts.es: Ambrocia de 49 años de edad vive sola en casa propia, ella se dedica a la compra y venta de maíz especialmente a las personas que elaboran tortillas, su negocio está ubicado en su lugar de residencia y tiene más de 9 años de dedicarse a esa actividad,  con lo que obtiene de sus ventas es como logar salir adelante, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de maíz por quintales para seguir con su negocio y así tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Ambrocia is 49 years old and lives alone in her own house. She works buying and selling corn, especially to people who make tortillas. Her business is located in her place of residence, and she has over 9 years of experience in the business. She lives off of what she earns from her sales.

She is requesting a loan to purchase corn by the quintal [100 lb.] to continue with her business and improve her income.

loans.use: to buy corn wholesale

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy tomatoes, peppers, onions, and other produce to sell.

loans.name: Judie

texts.en:
Judie is 46, married and from Ormoc City, Leyte. She runs a small sari-sari, or general store in the Philippines and earns additional income by raising pigs.

Judie is applying for a 10,000 PHP loan through CEVI to buy more groceries to sell such as canned goods, noodles, rice, condiments and cooking oil, plus additional pigs and feed. She is working on making her businesses a success and sustainable.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to sell and additional pigs and feed for them.

loans.name: Leonida

texts.en:
From Ormoc City, Leyte, Leonida is 45 years old, married and the mother of three children. For the past twelve years she has sold rice to make a living.

Leonida is applying for a 15,000 PHP loan through CEVI to buy more rice to build up her stock. She is working to make her business a success.

loans.use: to buy more rice to build up her stock.

loans.name: Lolita

texts.en:
Lolita is a 61-year-old resident of Ormoc City, Leyte. For the past several years she has earned a living by raising pigs.

Lolita is applying for a 15,000 PHP loan through CEVI to buy more piglets to raise, plus pig feed. This extra money will help her improve her venture as well as her income.

loans.use: to buy more piglets to raise, plus pig feed.

loans.name: Lucrecia

texts.en: Lucrecia is a 62 year-old married woman from Ormoc City, Leyte. She runs a small sari-sari or retail store selling various goods and items to the people in her local. Lucrecia has been in the business for more than 13 years.  Lucrecia is asking to take a loan to buy more groceries to sell like canned goods, noodles, soda and beverages, soap and toiletries, cooking oil and condiments. Lucrecia believes that through this loan she will be able to improve her stocks, thus attracting more buyers in her store.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to sell like canned goods, noodles, soda and beverages, soap and toiletries, cooking oil and condiments

loans.name: Sebastiana Cecilia

texts.es:
Sebastiana tiene 46 años de edad, es casada, vive en casa familiar con su cónyuge y 02 hijos en una comunidad habitada por gente trabajadora dedicada a la agricultura y ganadería que se encuentra ubicada en el distrito de Zaña, provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú.

Ella se dedica a la crianza y venta de carneros, cuyes y cerdos, desde hace casi 05 años, cuenta con experiencia en este negocio y con buenas referencias por parte de los pobladores de su distrito. Necesita préstamo para invertir en la compra de cerdos y alimentos para el engorde de estos, lo que le generará mayor cantidad de ventas y le va a permitir mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Sebastiana is 46 years old, married, and lives in her family’s home along with her husband and two children. They reside in a community where the people are known for working hard in agriculture and raising livestock. This area is located in the District of Zaña in Chiclayo Province, which is part of the region of Lambayeque on the northern coast of Peru.

Sebastiana has been raising and selling sheep, guinea pigs, and pigs for almost five years. She has experience in this business and good references from other residents in her district. Sebastiana needs a loan so that she can invest in the purchase of pigs and feed for fattening these animals. This will generate more sales so that she can improve her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: to buy pigs and animal feed.

loans.name: Sonunbu

texts.ru: Сонунбу, 34 года, замужем, мать 2 детей. У Сонунбу среднее образование, 15 лет она занимается сельским хозяйством. В хозяйстве есть 8 коров и 20 овец, также земельный надел мерою 0,40 ГА, где Сонунбу выращивает картофель. Дети с радостью помогают Сонунбу в ведении ее бизнеса. Есть все условия для содержания скота.  Ежемесячный доход Сонунбу от ведения бизнеса около 10,000 сом (KGS). Она обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 3 коров. Доходы от кредита Сонунбу планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, что позволит ей достроить дом.
texts.en: Sonunbu is 34 years old, married, and the mother of two children.  She has a secondary education and has worked in agriculture for the past 15 years.  She has eight cows and 20 sheep on her farm.  She also grows potatoes on 0.4 hectares of land.  Her children are happy to help her with the farm work.   Sonunbu has everything that she needs to keep livestock.  She makes a monthly income of about 10,000 som (KGS) from her activity.  She has turned to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC and requested a loan of 100,000 som (KGS) to buy three cows.  She is planning to invest the earnings from her loan into further increasing her number of domestic animals, which will help her to finish building her house.

loans.use: to buy three cows and invest in her business.

loans.name: Aida Isabel

texts.es:
Aida desde muy temprana edad aprendió el oficio de confección de ropa gracias a su mamá que toda su vida fue confeccionista y fue así como poco a poco margarita empezó a entender y aplicar estos conocimientos.

Es casa y no tiene hijos aun.
Es una mujer emprendedora, amorosa y siempre dispuesta a atender a sus clientes de la mejor manera.

Se siente muy agradecida con todo lo que ha podido construir hasta ahora con la ayuda de la Corporación Interactuar.

Madruga todos los días para trabajar en sus negocio durante 6 horas.
Ella pide un apoyo económico para comprar insumos de confección como tela, hilos y agujas; además desea realizar la compra de una maquina plana.

Tiene muchas esperanzas en su negocio y conserva la ilusión de tener un taller mucho más grande en el que pueda ofrecer empleo y aumentar sus clientes.
texts.en:
Aida at an early age learned the craft of making clothing thanks to her mother who all her life was a clothing maker. Aida thus gradually began to understand and apply this knowledge.

She is married and has no kids yet. She is an enterprising woman, loving, and always ready to serve customers in the best way.

She feels very grateful for all that could be built so far with the help of Interactuar.

She gets up early every day to work in her business for 6 hours. She asks for financial support to purchase inputs for clothing such as fabric, thread, and needles; she also wants to buy an industrial sewing machine.

She has high hopes for her business and dreams of having a much larger workshop in which she can provide employment and increase her customers.

loans.use: to buy inputs for making clothing such as fabric, thread, and needles; also she wants to buy an industrial sewing machine.

loans.name: Noralba De Las Mercedes

texts.es:
Noralba, una mujer de 61 años de edad que ha dado toda su vida en beneficio de su familia intentando sacarla  adelante y superando juntos las adversidades que se les han presentado en la vida; gracias a una tienda que con mucho esfuerzo, paciencia y sacrificio logro montar, ha generado los ingresos para el sostenimiento de sus hijos. 

Trabaja sola todos los días durante 10 horas.
Buscando ser la mejor empresa familiar del sector quiere solicitar un crédito para la compra de surtido que le permitan aumentar su inventario como granos y abarrotes.

De esta forma ira superando dificultades como las bajas ventas y la competencia.

Este crédito será la gran oportunidad para consolidarse como la tienda más productiva en el barrio y le dará la oportunidad de cumplir ese sueño que tanto ha anhelado de comprar una vivienda propia.

Apoya a Noralba con su negocio!
texts.en:
Noralba is a 61-year-old woman who has given her whole life for the good of her family, working to bring them to success and overcoming together the adversities that life brings. Thanks to a store that she succeeding in starting with much effort, patience, and sacrifice, she has made the money needed to support her children.

She works every day for 10 hours. Wanting to be the best family business in the area, she is requesting a loan to buy stock, such as grain and groceries, that will let her expand her inventory.

In this way, she will continue overcoming difficulties such as low sales and the competition.

This loan will be her big opportunity to establish herself as the most productive store in the neighborhood. It will give her the opportunity to fulfill that dream that she has always had to buy her own house.

Support Noralba in her business!

loans.use: to buy stock, such as grain and groceries, that will let her expand her inventory

loans.name: Lorenza

texts.en: Lorenza is a 63 year-old married woman and a mother of four grown up children from Ormoc City, Leyte. Lorenza runs a small sari-sari or retail store business selling various goods and items to the people in her place. Lorenza is asking to take a loan to buy more groceries to sell like canned goods, noodles, soda and beverages, soap and toiletries, cooking oil and condiments, bread and biscuits and others. A loan will help her improve her stocks thus attracting more buyers in her store.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to sell like canned goods, noodles, soda and beverages, soap and toiletries, cooking oil and condiments, bread and biscuits and others

loans.name: Catherine

texts.en:
Catherine is 32, married and a mother of three children, all living in Ormoc City, Leyte. For the past seven years she has earned a living by raising pigs.

Catherine is applying for a 15,000 PHP loan through CEVI to buy more piglets to raise, plus pig feed. This extra money will help her improve her business as well as her income.

loans.use: to buy more piglets to raise, plus pig feed.

loans.name: Leni

texts.en: Leni is a businesswoman who earns through retailing various items. She is a full-fledged member of PMPC and enjoys the benefits of insurances and financial assistance. Recently, she applied for a loan to purchase bags of cement and hollow blocks. She is on her way to finishing her house. She wishes to live comfortably with her family.

loans.use: to purchase bags of cement and hollow blocks to finish her house

loans.name: Latt

texts.en: Latt, a farmer living in Ek Phnom district of Battambang province, is 59 years old and a mother of two children, one of whom is dependent on her. For a living she grows rice and vegetables. To supplement the family’s income, she raises ducks. She has been involved in these businesses for 28 years and she can earn about 33,900 KHR per day. This is her sixth cycles with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) and she has fully repaid back her past loans as well. She will spend her entire loan to build a well to support her business. She hopes that she can have enough water to sustain her cash crops to earn more income to improve her lifestyle.

loans.use: To build a well to support her business.

loans.name: Marilyn

texts.en:
From Ormoc City, Leyte, Marilyn runs a small sari-sari, or general store in the Philippines, selling various goods and items to the people in her area.

Marilyn is applying for a 13,000 PHP loan through CEVI to buy more foods to sell such as canned goods, noodles, soda and other beverages, cooking oil, condiments, rice, bread and snack foods, plus personal items like soap and toiletries. A loan will help her improve her inventory, thus attracting more buyers to her store.

loans.use: to buy food and personal items to sell in her sari-sari

loans.name: Intocables Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “INTOCABLES” iniciará el séptimo ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Santiago II, está compuesta por ocho  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Rita es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de verduras, venta de comida, venta de mantas, venta de CD y DVD’s, venta de zapatos.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Rita es integrante, ella indica que hace un año que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de una asesora que fue a su domicilio a invitarle. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de carne; da a conocer que este negocio lo aprendió de su amiga, ya que le apoyaba en su negocio, actualmente comercializa sus productos en un espacio que consiguió. 

El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de carne por mayor) que adquirirá de vendedoras mayoristas de la ciudad de La Paz y posteriormente lo comercializará en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia económicamente, ya que ella es casada y tiene tres hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta la capacitación que ofrece la institución.
texts.en:
The Communal Bank “Intocables” is starting its seventh loan cycle with Pro Mujer as part of the Santiago II Community Center. This group consists of eight members and is led by a Board of Directors in which Sra. Rita serves as the president. The members of this Communal Bank engage in various businesses such as selling vegetables, selling food, selling blankets, selling CDs and DVDs, and selling shoes.

The loan will benefit small entrepreneurs such as Sra. Rita. She says that she joined Pro Mujer one year ago after receiving an invitation from an advisor who came to her home. Rita currently has a business where she sells meat. She became knowledgeable about this type of work after learning the trade from her friend by helping out at her business. Rita currently sells her products from a space that she acquired.

The loan she is receiving now will be used to increase her capital for buying meat in bulk. She acquires her inventory from the wholesale vendors in the city of La Paz and then sells her products from her retail space. Working in this manner allows her to generate income for supporting her family. Rita is married and has three children.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, Rita said that she enjoys the training seminars offered by the organization.

loans.use: to buy meat in bulk.

loans.name: Julieta

texts.en:
Julieta is a married woman and the mother of four children from Ormoc City, Leyte. She is engaged in a poultry business. 

Julieta has been in this business for more than 7 years now. She is asking for a loan to buy more chicks and animal feed. 

This loan will help her improve her business as well as her income. In the future, Julieta hopes of making her business a success.

loans.use: to buy more chicks and animal feed.

loans.name: Abbass

texts.en:
Abbass is a 22-year-old single man who has been working as a contractor for five years to cover his needs and expenses. He gained experience in this field from his father who also is a contractor.
 
Abbass in an independent and ambitious man who is working hard to develop his business. Therefore, he is acquiring a YOUTH loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to buy the necessary equipment and tools to facilitate his business. This will help him provide his customers' with better and quicker service.

Abbass hopes to expand his business more in the future to increase his income and to improve his living conditions.

loans.use: to buy the necessary equipment and tools to facilitate his business.

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es:
Juan Carlos es un profesional de la catación de 47 años, está casado y es asociado a la cooperativa COCAFCAL. Juan Carlos también está en el negocio de la miel orgánica cosechando colmenas de dos tipos: Abejas comunes –apis melífera-y meliponas –abejas sin aguijón.
Juan Carlos quiere incrementar sus ingresos para  mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia, el negocio de la miel es un negocio novedoso en la zona y que deja muy buenas ganancias ya la producción es abundante gracias a la abundante flora de la región. Además las abejas ayudan a la polinización con efectos muy positivos en todas las plantas de la zona. La comercialización es fácil pues la realiza a través de COCAFCAL que la vende localmente y a los USA. La miel orgánica de las abejas meliponas es un producto muy escaso en los mercados nacionales e internacionales así que los precios son buenos y las ganancias aportan buenos ingresos a las familias productoras. 
Juan quiere un préstamo para comprar 10 cajas para colmenas de abejas meliponas lo cual le permitirá ampliar su producción de miel. El préstamo permitirá a Juan poder tener mejores ingresos para poder seguir ampliando su meliponario y así mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Juan Carlos is a 47 years old married Honduran. He is a cupping professional associated with COCAFCAL Cooperative. Juan Carlos is also involved in the organic honey business reaping 2 bee hives types: Common bees - apis melífera- and  melipona bees - stingless bees. 
Juan Carlos wants to increase his income to improve the quality of life of his family. Organic honey business is a brand new business that leaves high income because due to the wide flora and variety of plants production is abundant. Bees help pollination with very good effects on the plants of the region. Commercialization is easy because it is done through COCAFCAL. This cooperative sells the honey locally and to the USA. The organic honey of melipona bees is a scarce product in both national and international markets, that´s why the price is good and this activity generates high income to the families that produce it.
Juan Carlos wants a loan to buy 10 boxes for Melipona bee hives that will enable him to increase his honey production. The loan will enable Juan Carlos having higher income to expand his production and this way improve the quality of life of his family.

loans.use: To buy 10 boxes for Melipona bee hives.

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
Jocelyn signed up for her membership with PMPC and obtained the needed capital to start up a sari-sari store business. She is thankful for the capital that was extended to a small-time borrower like her. 

Jocelyn was able to turn the tide in her favor, and is making many sales these days. She wants to take advantage of her good fortune. 

Recently, she took a loan to restock her store with basic commodities like canned goods, oil, and soy sauce. 

In the future, she hopes to build a decent home for the family.

loans.use: to restock her store with items like canned goods, oil, and soy sauce.

loans.name: Esteria

texts.en: Esteria is a businesswoman from Tudela. She is 54 years old, married with seven children and has expertise in selling. She runs a little sari-sari store and earns a meager income that sufficiently supports her family. Esteria is a full-fledged member of PMPC and has taken several loans already. She maintains her membership in good standing without any records of default. Now, she has applied for a loan to restock her store with basic commodities and other consumable items. Esteria continues to look for better business opportunities, proof that she has the passion and the energy to make ends meet for her family.

loans.use: to restock her store with basic commodities and other consumable items

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en: Elizabeth is a 52-year-old married woman from Ormoc City, Leyte. She runs a small sari-sari or retail store business selling various goods and items to the people in her place. Elizabeth has been in the business for more than 15 years now. She also earns additional income through hog raising. Elizabeth is asking for a loan to buy piglets to raise.  Elizabeth hopes to make her business a success and stable.

loans.use: to buy piglets to raise

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy one cow

loans.name: Moataz

texts.en:
Moataz is a father of seven children who runs a grocery store in the rural area of Haja, Yemen. Selling canned foods, soft drinks, some vegetables, ropes, hair creams and other goods is the sole source of income for him and his family. Moataz applied for a loan of 500,000 YER from AMB in order to purchase the necessary goods and items that people need daily to expand his business. A long time ago, he started his business selling only water and some soft drinks in a very small shop to the people who transport overland from Saudi Arabia to Yemen and vice versa. Over time, his business improved and he opened a grocery store as you can see in the photo. A Kiva loan will help Moataz to face most of the demands of his customers and the profits from this loan will increase. He will be able to take his wife outside of the country for treatment because she has a dangerous disease. Also, this loan will help Moataz to provide his children with better living conditions.

Moataz looks forward to opening another grocery store beside the first one to create work for his children.

loans.use: To purchase the necessary goods and items that people need daily to expand his business

loans.name: Imelda

texts.en: Imelda is a 50-year-old married woman and a mother of three children from Ormoc City, Leyte. She earns a living through her hog-raising business. Imelda has been in the business for more than 20 years now. This is the source of her income. Imelda is asking to take a loan to buy additional piglets to raise and animal feed. Imelda believes that a loan will help her improve her business as well as her income.

loans.use: to buy additional piglets to raise and animal feed

loans.name: Soeung's Group

texts.en: A resident living in Koh Sotin district of Kampong Cham provinces, Soeung is 61 years old and a mother of four children, two of whom are dependent on her and still in high school. To support her family conditions, she sells grocery items as the main source of income and she grows corn to supplement her family’s income. This is her first time with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She is the group leader of three members. As the group leader, she will spend her loan portion to rent farmland, and buy seeds of corn, sesame and soybeans. She hopes that she can expand her current business to earn more income.

loans.use: To rent farmland and buy seeds of corn, sesame and soybeans.

location.town: Kampong Cham Province, Koh Sotin District

loans.name: Narcisa

texts.en: Narcisa is a 53-year-old married woman and a mother of three grown-up children from Ormoc City, Leyte. Narcisa has earned a living through her hog-raising business for more than five years now. Narcisa is asking to take a loan to buy additional piglets to raise and animal feed. Narcisa believes that a loan will help her improve her business as well as her income.

loans.use: to buy additional piglets to raise and animal feed

loans.name: Hala

texts.en:
Hala is a 54-year-old married mother of six children who decided to run a grocery store in 2012 to support her beloved husband in covering their family's needs and requests.

Hala is a hardworking woman who is making so much effort to increase her business merchandise to develop her business and increase her family's living.

Currently, her business income is barely enough to cover her family's increasing living needs, so she can't rely on this income to increase her business capital. Thus, for this reason, she is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to increase her business merchandise with special spring and summer beverages and special offer products to increase her income and develop her living.

She hopes to stay capable of developing her business to make sure she can cover her family's increasing living needs.

loans.use: To increase her business merchandise with special spring and summer beverages and special offer products to increase her income and develop her living

loans.name: Dove Group

texts.en:
Jamila, who is in her late 20s, is married with one daughter who is still in school.  She has been running a beauty salon for three years now.  She works from 8 am to 9 pm daily and is able to make a good monthly profit.

This will be Jamila's first loan from Tujijenge Tanzania.  She will use this loan to buy up-to-date salon equipment and meet her customers' requirements and demands.  She dreams of taking her salon to international levels.

Jamila will share this loan with her loan group "Dove", which consist of three members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy up-to-date salon equipment and meet her customers' requirements and demands.

loans.name: Eleuterio

texts.en: Eleuterio is a 45-year-old married man and a father of two children from Ormoc City, Leyte. He is engaged in a motorcycle transport business. This is the source of his income. Eleuterio also earns an additional income through his hog-raising business and his sari-sari or retail store. Eleuterio is asking to take a loan to buy additional piglets to raise and animal feed and stocks for his store like canned goods, noodles, soda and beverages, soap and toiletries, cooking oil and condiments and other items. A loan will help Eleuterio improve his business as well as his income.

loans.use: to buy additional piglets to raise and animal feed and stock for his store like canned goods, noodles, soda and beverages, soap and toiletries

loans.name: Idalina

texts.pt:
Nasceu na província de Maputo tem 46 anos de idade, vive maritalmente mãe de 2 filhos, apenas 1 é menor de idade, todos frequentam a escola, responsabiliza-se pelas suas enteadas que se encontram no Maputo.
É avicultora há bastante tempo onde ganha um valor que aplica nas despesas da sua casa. Dona Idalina começou a trabalhar com Hluvuku em 2012, pois com o fundo próprio não conseguia satisfazer as necessidades dos seus clientes devido a insuficiência de crédito. Já trabalhando com a Hluvuku conseguiu adquirir um novo espaço para erguer a sua  residência e hoje já é uma das melhores aviculturas do Distrito. Este é o seu 4º empréstimo na Hluvuku para dar continuidade a sua obra adquirindo o seguinte material de construção: areia, cimento, pedras e mais. 
Futuramente pretende terminar a sua obra e expandir mais no seu negócio de criação de frangos. O seu maior desafio é ver sua nova casa já concluída.
texts.en: Idalina was born in Maputo province and is now 46 years old. She lives with her husband with whom she has 2 children. One of her children is very young but they both attend school and Idalina is also financially responsible for her 2 stepdaughters, who also live in Maputo. She has been working as a poultry farmer for quite some time and this provides her with a wage which she uses for her household expenses. Idalina has been involved with Hluvuku since 2012 when her lack of funds meant that she was unable to satisfy her customers' requirements using her own money alone. Her involvement with Hluvuku has already enabled her to acquire her own plot of land on which to build her home and, these days, she is one of the best poultry farmers in her district. This will be her fourth loan with Hluvuku and she plans to use this loan to continue the building work on her home by buying more materials, such as sand, cement, stone and other items. In the future, she hopes to finish the work on her house and to further expand her poultry farming business. The greatest challenge that she faces is ensuring that her newly-built house will be finished and ready for her and her family.

loans.use: to buy sand, cement, stone and other items.

loans.name: Natalí

texts.es:
Natali es madre de un hijo de 4 años de edad; desde hace algún tiempo se dedica a trabajar como comerciante independiente, actividad que aprendió de manera empírica y que surgió de la necesidad de generar recursos para el sustento de su familia; ofrece todo tipo de productos como, perfumería, cremas corporales, productos de nutrición, entre otros y cuenta con la ventaja de que diariamente conoce nuevas personas a las que les puede ofrecer su mercancía, mejorando cada día sus ventas. 

Actualmente solicita el apoyo del crédito para comprar mercancía al por mayor de estos productos, asi podrá abastecerse con más variedad para satisfacer la demanda que se incrementa en esta temporada; mejorando su nivel de ingresos.

Natali, con empeño y dedicación, desea seguir trabajando para sacar adelante su negocio, ya que para un futuro cercano, sueña con tener la posibilidad de montar un almacén en un local comercial donde pueda ofrecer mayor variedad de artículos y que le genere una rentabilidad y una estabilidad económica favorable para dar a su hijo una excelente educación y una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Natali is the mother of a four-year-old son and, for some time, has been working as an independent merchant.  She learned the business on her own out of a need to generate an income to support her family.  She sells all kinds of products, including perfumes, body lotions, health products, etc. and has the advantage of meeting new people every day.  This allows her to offer her products and improve sales on a daily basis.

The loan she is currently requesting is to buy wholesale products to have a wider variety on hand to meet the seasonal rise in demand.  This will improve her income.

With determination and dedication, Natali wants to continue working so her business can thrive.  In the near future she hopes to be able to open a shop in a local shopping center so she can offer a wider variety of merchandise.  This is aimed at earning a profit and having a stable economy so she can give her son an excellent education and better quality of life.

loans.use: To buy perfumes, body lotions, health products, etc.

loans.name: Ana Jessica

texts.es: Ana de 38 años de edad vive en casa propia con su madre, ella se dedica a la venta de productos de uso personal desde hace 3 años, su negocio está ubicado en su lugar de residencia y tiene muchos clientes, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, Ana esta solicitando un crédito para comprar perfumes, lociones, cremas, desodorantes, shampoo, etc. todo por mayor y asi continuar con su trabajo para tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Ana, 38, lives in her own home with her mother.  She has been selling personal products for three years and runs the business out of her home.  She has many customers and is able to cover household expenses with her earnings.  

Ana is requesting a loan to buy wholesale perfumes, lotions, creams, deodorants, shampoo, etc. to continue her work and earn more income.

loans.use: To buy wholesale perfumes, lotions, creams, deodorants, shampoo, etc.

loans.name: Carlos Antonio

texts.es: Carlos de 48 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, el se dedica a la venta de gas propano, tiene 8 años de poseer el negocio el cual le genera buenas ganancias, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas gas propano por mayor para continuar con sus ventas y asi tener mejores ingresos económicos.
texts.en: Carlos, 48, lives in his own house with his family.  He sells propane gas and has been in business for eight years, earning a good profit.  He is able to cover household expenses with his income.  The loan he is requesting is to buy wholesale propane gas to continue his sales activity and earn more income.

loans.use: To buy wholesale propane gas.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy bags, rucksacks and school supplies

loans.name: Arlex

texts.es:
Arlex, a sus 41 años de edad, es casado y padre de 3 hijos, a los que ha sacado adelante con arduo esfuerzo y dedicación. 

Durante mucho tiempo ha trabajado como comerciante independiente en su propio almacén de ropa; allí trabaja todos los días durante 10 horas y ha logrado generar los ingresos para solventar las necesidades familiares.
Expresa que su interés con el crédito es invertir en la compra de surtido al por mayor como blusas y ropa para bebe, entre otros para abastecerse lo suficiente y poder satisfacer los gustos de su clientela con la variedad que ofrecerá; esto le ayudará a mejorar las ventas  y los ingresos que recibe, además le hará frente a su mayor desafío que es sostenerse frente a la competencia desleal que se presenta en el sector. 

Arlex manifiesta que su mayor anhelo es mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda y pagar la educación de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Arlex, 41, is married and has three children who he is raising with hard work and dedication.

For a long time he has worked as an independent merchant in his own clothing shop.  He works ten hours every day and has been able to cover the family necessities with his income.

He says his interest in the loan is to buy blouses and baby clothing, wholesale, to have enough stock and variety to satisfy customer demand.  This will help improve sales and income.  It also will help him face his greatest challenge which is the unloyal competition in the sector.

Arlex slays his greatest goal is to improve the conditions of his home and to pay for his children's education.

loans.use: To buy a variety of blouses and baby clothes, wholesale.

loans.name: Maravilhosa

texts.pt:
Nasceu na província de Inhambane tem 41 anos de idade, viúva mãe de 4 filhos apenas 1 é maior de idade, todos frequentam a escola. Não responsabiliza-se por ninguém.
Trabalha numa empresa  como promotora de crianças a mais de 4 anos onde aufere um valor que aplica nas despesas da sua casa, é proprietária de um estabelecimento comercial de venda de produtos da 1ª necessidade, enfrentando dificuldades a mesma solicita um empréstimo para aumentar o volume da sua mercadoria adquirindo, arroz, acuçar,oleo e bolachas para satisfazer as necessidades dos seus clientes. Este é o seu 1º empréstimo na Hluvuku.
Futuramente pretende adquirir uma viatura, tirar carta de condução e garantir o ensino dos seus filhos até ao nível superior.
texts.en: Maravilhosa was born in Inhambane province and is 41 years old. She is a widowed mother to 4 children, one of whom is already fully grown, and all of whom attend school. She is not financially responsible for anyone else. For the last 4 years, she has been working in a kindergarten, where she earns a wage to pay for her household expenses, and she also runs a shop in which she sells basic essentials. As she has encountered difficulties with her business, she is now applying for this loan so that she increase her stock level by buying rice, sugar, cooking oil and biscuits to satisfy her customers' requirements. This will be her first loan with Hluvuku and, in the future, she hopes to buy a vehicle, gain her driving license and ensure that her children attain their highest level of education.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, cooking oil and biscuits to satisfy her customers' requirements.

loans.name: Monica

texts.pt:
Nasceu na Província de Maputo tem 40 anos de idade, casada oficialmente mãe de 5 filhos maiores de idade, todos frequentam a escola, responsabiliza-se pelos seus pais que vivem aqui em namaacha.
É criadora de frangos e negociante de roupa usada no mercado informal vulgo shoprite a mais de 11anos onde ganha um valor que aplica nas despesas da sua casa. Na tentativa de satisfazer os seus clientes e melhorar ainda mais o seu negócio de criação de frangos solícita um empréstimo para adquirir ração, pintos e vitaminas. Este é o seu 6º empréstimo na Hluvuku.
Futuramente pretende ampliar o volume do seu negócio abrindo estabelecimento comercial de venda de produtos da 1ª necessidade
texts.en: Monica was born in Maputo province and is 40 years old. She is a married mother to 5 older children, all of whom attend school, and she is also responsible for her parents who live close by in Namaacha. She works as a poultry farmer and she has also been running a business selling second-hand clothing in the informal Shoprite market for more than 11 years, where she earns a wage to spend on her household expenses. In an attempt to satisfy her customers' requirements and further improve her poultry business, she is applying for this loan so that she can buy feed, chicks and vitamins. This will be her 6th loan with Hluvuku. In the future, she hopes to increase her business stock level and open a shop of her own selling essential groceries.

loans.use: to buy feed, chicks and vitamins

loans.name: Catalina Arely

texts.es: Catalina de 55 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo, ella se dedica a la venta de productos de uso personal, tiene 6 años de dedicarse a ese negocio, vende en los alrededores de donde ella vive y tiene muchos clientes, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de perfumes, lociones, cremas, desodorantes, shampoo, etc. todo por mayor y poder tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Catalina, 55, lives in her own home with her husband.  She sells personal products and has been in business for six years.  She conducts her sales activity in the areas around where she lives and she has many customers.  With her income she is able to cover some of the household expenses.

She is requesting a loan to buy wholesale perfumes, lotions, creams, deodorants, shampoo, etc. so she can have a better quality of life.

loans.use: To buy wholesale perfumes, lotions, creams, deodorants, shampoo, etc.

loans.name: Preselina

texts.pt:
Nasceu na província de Inhambane tem 42 anos de idade, solteira mãe de 4 filhos que frequentam a escola, não responsabiliza-se por ninguém.
É negociante a mais de 7 anos de venda de feijão e amendoim onde ganha um valor que aplica nas despesas da sua casa. Na tentativa de satisfazer os seus clientes solicita um empréstimo para aumentar o volume do seu negócio comprando amendoim e feijão. Este é o seu 1º empréstimo na Hluvuku.
Futuramente pretende ampliar o seu negócio e adquirir uma camionete para transportar os seus produtos. O seu maior desafio é manter o seu negócio como base de sustentabilidade.
texts.en: Preselina was born in Inhambane province and is 42 years old. She is a single mother to 4 children who all attend school, and she is not responsible for anyone else. For the last 7 years, she has been running a business selling beans and nuts from which she earns a wage to cover her household expenses. In an attempt to satisfy her customers' requirements, she is applying for this loan so that she can buy nuts and beans. This will be her first loan with Hluvuku and, in the future, she hopes to expand her business and buy a truck for transporting her products. The greatest challenge that she faces is maintaining her business in order to sustain her family's needs.

loans.use: to buy nuts and beans

loans.name: Sreyya's Group

texts.en: A mother of one schoolchild living in Battambang province, Sreyya is 30 years old. For her living condition, she grows rice as the main source of income and drives a car to supplement her income. She has been involved in this business for ages and earns about 37,500 KHR per day. This is not her first time with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) and she has fully repaid her past loan. She leads a group of two members to get new loan. As the group leader, she will spend her entire loan portion to buy fertilizer and seed and pay the plowing fee. She hopes that she can get more income to support her child’s education as well.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and seed and pay the plowing fee.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a Juki sewing machine for sewing garments.

loans.name: Shahida

texts.en:
Shahida is an active borrower of BRAC Pakistan. She lives with her five children and husband in Rawalpindi, Pakistan. Her husband is the guardian of her family. He has been running a cosmetics shop for the past three years.
 
Shahida's husband wants to purchase different types of cosmetic accessories for his business purpose, but due to insufficient financial means, he is unable to purchase these accessories. Therefore, Shahida has applied for a Kiva loan from its field partner BRAC Pakistan. With the help of this loan, she’ll enable her husband to purchase relevant items for his business purpose so that he can earn a more profitable income to manage his business and household.

Shahida is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to increase her husband's cosmetics business

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en: Teresita is a 47-year-old married woman and a mother of five children from Ormoc City, Leyte. She is engaged in a sari-sari or retail store business selling various goods and items to the people in her place. Teresita has been in the business for more than three years now. Teresita is asking to take a loan to buy more groceries to sell like canned goods, noodles, soda and beverages, soap and toiletries, cooking oil and condiments, biscuits and bread, among other items. Teresita believes that a loan will help her improve her business as well as her income and profit.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to sell like canned goods, noodles, soda and beverages, soap and toiletries, cooking oil and condiments,  biscuits and bread among other items

loans.name: Sakom's Group

texts.en: An old woman living in Battambang province, Sakom is 63 years old and a mother of nine children. Nowadays, she needs to support five of the children, four of whom are studying at the university. For her family, she grows rice on eight hectares as the single main source of her income. This is her fourth loan with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) and she has fully repaid her past loans successfully. In a group of three, she is the group leader and she will spend her loan portion to buy a decent motorcycle for her children to go to school. She hopes that her children can complete their studies successfully.

loans.use: To buy a decent motorcycle for her children to go to school

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy fresh and smoked fish.

loans.name: Luz Mary

texts.es:
Luz, una mujer de 46 años de edad llena de sueños y aspiraciones en su vida, vive en una finca en el municipio de Puerto Salgar y se gana la vida con la producción y venta de animales.  
Con este trabajo intenta sostener a su familia compuesta por sus 4 hijos.
Es un trabajo que ha venido ejerciendo desde hace aproximadamente 1 año con el fin de salir adelante y dejar de jornalear.

Pide un apoyo económico para la compra de pollos, gallinas ponedoras, cerdos, alimento y materiales para su galpón y corral.
Con este préstamo podrá tener un negocio más sostenible y consolidado.

Con un préstamo que hagas hoy podrás mejorar la vida y el negocio de Luz!
texts.en:
Luz is 46 years old and has many hopes and dreams for her life. She lives on a farm in the municipality of Puerto Salgar, and she makes a living rearing and selling livestock. She attempts to support her family of four sons with what she earns from her work. She has been working in this field for about a year with the hope of getting ahead and leaving her day job. 

She is asking for a loan in order to buy chickens, laying hens, pigs, feed and material for her farmhouse and yard. With this loan she will be able to have a stronger, more sustainable business. 

Support this loan and you could help improve Luz's life and her business!

loans.use: to buy chickens, laying hens, pigs, feed and materials for her farmhouse and yard.

loans.name: Gilda

texts.en:
Gilda runs a sari-sari (variety) store. She sells items including sugar, canned goods, noodles, cooking, oil, toiletries, powdered milk and condiments.  She is a 40-year-old married woman with three children who are eight, nine and 15 years old, respectively.  She has been operating a sari-sari (variety) store for eight years.

She has requested a loan to buy grocery items like rice and drinks. With these, her store will be filled again with a variety of stock and attract consumers to purchase.  Thus, she could now expand her business and start to invest in a possible business venture. With this, she would be able to finance the schooling of her children.
                                                                                                                          
Gilda hopes that she can properly handle her existing business for a sustainable living.

loans.use: to buy grocery items like rice and drinks

loans.name: Virginia

texts.en:
Virginia raises and sells ducks to earn a living. Aside from that, she also engages in a dressmaking business.  She is 60 years old and married with two grown children. She has been engaged in these kinds of businesses for four years now. In order to continue her existing businesses, she decided to take a loan.

Virginia has requested a loan to purchase materials like cloth, needles, zippers, and duck feed. These will enable her to cater to the orders of her respective customers and provide more dressmaking services. She will also be able to continue her duck raising business to improve her livelihood.  Thus, her income will augment and she will be able to expand both of her businesses. She hopes that she can handle the businesses properly for the improvement of her livelihood.

loans.use: to purchase materials like cloth, needles, zippers, and duck feed

loans.name: Lucia

texts.en:
Lucia works hard to support her family. She is married and has a food vending business in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional frozen foods, meat, chicken, etc.

Lucia has been in this business for 10 years now.

In the future, Lucia would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional frozen foods, meat, chicken, etc

loans.name: Virginia

texts.en:
Virginia engages in raising and selling hogs. She is a married woman and has been engaged in the hog-raising business for quite a few years now. To be able to continue to operate her livelihood activity, she decided to take a loan.

She has requested a loan to buy additional piglets, pig feed and vitamins. With these, her hog-raising business will improve and in that way, she can raise and sell healthy pigs in the coming months. Thus, she can start expanding her business and be able to handle her finances.
 
She hopes that she can manage her existing business for the improvement of the family’s status of living.

loans.use: to buy additional piglets, pig feed and vitamins

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: purchase electriical tube rods, switches, copper wires, bulbs and energy saver bulbs of various brands for her son

loans.name: Phan's Group

texts.en: Residing in Battambang province, Phan is 44 years old and a mother of five children. To overcome her family’s hardship, she raises pigs and works for others for a fee to earn more income. For Phan, this is her second loan with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) and she has fully repaid her past loan. She leads a group of three members to get a new loan. As the group leader, she will spend her loan portion to buy more piglets. She hopes that she can get more income to update her lifestyle so it is better than it was before.

loans.use: To buy more piglets

loans.name: Tahira

texts.en:
Tahira is 41 years old and lives in Rawalpindi, Pakistan with her three children. Her husband has been working in a public sector organization for many years. Her husband is responsible for fulfilling the needs of the family. Tahira is also providing sewing services and earns income to contribute with her husband to manage the household. 

She needs different kinds of goods, e.g. needles, thread, pieces of cloth, machine oil, etc for her business purpose, but due to insufficient financial means, she is unable to purchase these goods. Therefore, she has applied for a Kiva loan from its field partner BRAC Pakistan. This loan will enable her to purchase the above items and will also help her to increase her monthly sales and profit by providing better sewing services.

Tahira is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to increase her tailoring business

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy traditional cloth skirts

loans.name: Maria Angela

texts.es: Maria vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, ella se dedica a la pesca artesanal desde hace 10 años, comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su casa, con lo que obtiene de sus ganancias logra solventar algunos gastos de su casa, Maria está solicitando un crédito para la compra de redes, trasmallos y darle mantenimiento al motor de la lancha que es el que muestra en la fotografía para poder tener mejores ingresos económicos.
texts.en:
Maria lives in her own home with her family group. 

She earns a living through artisanal fishing, which she's done for ten years, and she sells her products in the markets located near her home. With her profits, she is able to meet some of her household expenses.

Maria is requesting the loan to buy fishing nets, including trammel, as well as to maintain the motor of the boat, which is shown in the photo, so that she can improve her earnings.

loans.use: to buy fishing nets, trammel, and to maintain the motor of the boat.

loans.name: Elba Santiaga

texts.es: Las ganas de salir adelante es lo que ha llevado a Doña Elba a salir adelante en su pequeño negocio este es el tercer financiamiento que solicita a MiCrédito y se siente muy agradecida porque los anteriores le han sido de mucho beneficio.  Es por esta razón que solicita un nuevo crédito para comprar galletas, jugos, chocolates, chicles entre otros para seguir aumentado sus ventas y crecer.
texts.en: The desire to get ahead is what has brought Elba to get ahead in her small business. This is the third loan that she asks for from MiCrédito and she is very grateful because the previous loans have been very beneficial. For this reason, she asks for another loan to purchase cookies, juices, chocolates, gum and more to continue increasing her sales and growing.

loans.use: to purchase cookies, juices, chocolates, gum, and more.

loans.name: Claris Isabel

texts.es: Claris de 33 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo, ella se dedica a la venta de hamburguesas y antojitos, su negocio está ubicado cerca de su casa en una zona muy transitada tiene 2 años de experiencia, con las ventas que realiza logra salir adelante, ella está solicitando un crédito para comprar todo lo  necesario para elaborar las hamburguesas como: pan, tomates, cebollas, mayonesa, mortadelas, entre otros ingredientes y poder tener mejores ganancias y seguir ayudando en su casa con los gastos que se le puedan presentar.
texts.en: Claris, 33 years old, lives in her own house with her husband. She works selling hamburgers and snacks. Her business is located near her house in a high-traffic area. She has 2 years of experiences. With the sales that she makes, she manages to get ahead. She is asking for a loan to purchase all that is necessary to make the hamburgers such as bread, tomatoes, onions, mayonnaise, mortadella sausages, and other ingredients, and to be able to have more earnings and continue helping in her house with the expenses that can come up.

loans.use: to purchase bread, tomatoes, onions, mayonnaise, mortadella sausages, and other ingredients.

loans.name: Luyen

texts.en: Luyen is a 34-year-old married woman with one child. She meets  the family’s daily cost with earnings from small business and fishing. Her family lives in a small house without sanitation. She will use the loan to build a hygienic latrine to improve the health of her family.

loans.use: to build the latrine.

loans.name: Nhung

texts.en:
Nhung is a 30-year-old married woman with two children. She needs a loan to build a  latrine to improve  her family’s health and environment protection. 

Fishing and animal husbandry are the main sources of income for her family. She is able to repay the loan.

loans.use: to build the latrine.

loans.name: Jose

texts.es:
Jose es un hombre de 35 años de edad, vive con su pareja, tiene 1 hijo varón de 8 años y una hija mujer de 10 años, y trabaja como asalariado en una fábrica de porcelana.
Él es buen padre, comprensivo, de buena actitud, paciente, responsable y trabajador. Su trabajo lo realiza en la localidad de ‘Sacaba’; área rural ubicada a 13 kilómetros al este de la ciudad, conocida por su gastronomía basada en carne de conejo cuy y es famosa por sus numerosas chicherias, que elaboran la chicha de maíz,(Que es un fermento de la misma) de un agradable sabor, se cita al pueblo con picardía como "Sacaba - donde la chicha no se acaba" de clima templado, con una temperatura que varía durante el día entre 19-25 grados centígrados.
Jose es de tez morena, ojos pardos usa lentes de aumento, cabello lacio negro corto, baja estatura, complexión física mediana, su lengua materna es el Quechua que se habla en el lugar y habla español por cultura general y por el trabajo que efectúa. Su vida la comparte con su pareja que trabaja en el comercio de verduras y con sus hijos que estudian en la escuela. Viven en una casa propia construida de ladrillo y cemento con techo de calamina que cuenta con energía eléctrica, para obtener agua deben caminar una distancia aproximada de 10 minutos hasta el rio para recoger agua en baldes y depositarla en turriles para diferentes usos. Él trabaja en una fábrica de cerámica controlando la calidad de los productos, actividad que realiza en horario continuo de lunes a viernes. “en 3 años que construyo mi casa no tenemos agua potable porque el servicio es nuevo por la zona…” comenta. La ventaja de su trabajo es que le deja los fines de semana libres para estar con su familia, la desventaja es que las jornadas son largas. Su sueño es tener agua potable en su casa, él desea realizar la instalación de agua potable en su cocina, baño y lavandería para que su familia no use agua sucia del rio. Esta es la 1 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 3 años que trabaja en la construcción de su casa.
Es por estos motivos que Jose solicita un préstamo para la instalación de agua potable en su cocina, baño y lavandería para que su familia deje de usar el agua sucia del rio.
texts.en:
Jose is a 35-year-old man. He lives with his partner and has 1 son who is 8 and a daughter who is 10, and he works at a salaried job in a porcelain factory.

He is a good father, understanding, with a good attitude, patient, responsible and hard-working.
