Jessina has been in this business for five years now, and has borrowed two times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Jessina would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed and other supplies to raise her livestock.

loans.name: Esther

texts.en:
As a widowed parent of five children, Esther works hard to support her family.

She has a buy-and-sell flowers business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a general store. Esther is borrowing PHP 5,000 through NWTF to buy more flowers to sell.

Esther has been sustaining her business activities through her past two loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more flowers to sell.

loans.name: Sosten

texts.en:
Almost all Kenyans are farmers. Wonderful Kiva lenders, meet Sosten, a 25-year-old mixed farmer based in Chebarus, a remote village in the Nandihills area of Kenya.

This charming father of one lovely angel has been engaged in mixed farming for the past three years. He commands a lot of respect from fellow farmers in his village. His main sources of income have been eggs, milk, and a variety of food crops that he plants.

Taking care of his poultry is an activity he finds very enjoyable. Feeding his poultry is his hobby. Poultry farming is a very profitable business venture in Nandihills. Sosten has good knowledge of the market and has been taking advantage of the ready market. However, the demand is so high. Being a visionary man, he has always wanted to increase his poultry. He is seeking a loan to buy additional poultry.

Accessing financial services for marginalized communities is very difficult, but through institutions such as Kiva, enterprising men like Sosten will achieve their dreams and goals. Sosten believes that the key to increased egg production is proper feeding of poultry and taking good care of them. By ensuring that the poultry are fed well, he is guaranteed to reap the benefits.

In addition to selling eggs and poultry meat, he will also sell poultry feathers that are commonly used to make earrings. The increased income will be used to improve his living conditions and to repay the loan.

loans.use: to buy poultry.

loans.name: Ketevan

texts.en:
Ketevan is 24 years old. She is married and lives with her husband and 4-year-old son in the Akhaltsikhe district. 

Ketevan works as a sales lady at a local clothes shop. Now she wants to start her own business and requested a loan. The Start Up program, which is a joint initiative with Kiva and Credo, enables her to get a loan of 3,000 USD. 

With the received credit, she will purchase a stock of clothes and will sell in Akhaltsikhe. She will be able to generate more income and improve the living conditions for her child.

loans.use: to purchase a stock of clothes to start her business

loans.name: Loreta

texts.en: While Loreta wants to thank all of the people who helped her with the previous loan, she now wants to again buy inventory items, such as used shoes and other footwear, to resell.

loans.use: to buy used and/or new damaged shoes from producers to resell.

loans.name: Loise's Group

texts.en:
Loise, pictured above, has been a farmer for more than thirty years and is now proud to represent her group of eleven farmers in Kakamega North District. She is 56 years old, is married and has five children.

Loise likes to think of herself as a very hardworking individual. She has been working alongside One Acre Fund since 2012 and decided to represent her group because she wanted to help more farmers. She says that being part of the One Acre Fund community has meant that she has been able to consistently feed her family.

Loise is also purchasing a solar light this year, and she is so excited because she will now be able to reduce the consumption of paraffin fuel and therefore save more money. She plans to use the profits from this coming season to send her children to school.

In total, Loise’s Group will receive a total of eight solar lights between them and inputs to cultivate 5.75 acres of land.

loans.use: to purchase hybrid seeds and fertilizer to improve harvests of maize.

loans.name: Oscar Enrique

texts.es:
Oscar es un hombre de 62 años de edad que se dedica a dos profesiones, es cultivador de plátano y alterna esta profesión con la cría de ganado porcino, por necesidad económica le toco tener dos actividades económicas puesto que su familia es muy amplia y solo él lleva dinero al hogar, tiene un total de 6 hijos, 5 de ellos menores de edad, pero todos estudian y depende de Oscar.

Sus habilidades agrícolas las aprendió de sus padres los cuales le heredaron las tierras.

Oscar quiere solicitar un préstamo que quiere invertir en la compra de cerdos y con el sobrante del capital desea construir unas mejores cocheras, puesto que cuando cae agua, tiene que llevar los animales a su hogar para que no se mojen o adquieran alguna enfermedad, por ello les construirá un espacio cubierto y más de acorde para ellos.
texts.en: Oscar is a 62 year old man who works at two professions. He is s banana farmer and he alternates this with the office of raising pigs. He has two economic activities as his family is very large and he is the only one to bring money into the house. He has a total of 6 children, 5 of them minors and all of them study and depend on Oscar. He learned his agricultural skills from his parents from whom he inherited his land. Oscar wants to request a loan as he wants to invest in buying pigs and with the money that is left over he wants to build better enclosures as when it rains he has to take the animals to his house so they don't get wet or get some sickness. So he wants to construct a covered space more appropriate for them.

loans.use: to buy pigs and if there is extra money to build better pens that can withstand climatic changes.

loans.name: Catalina

texts.en:
Catalina, 57 years old, is married and has four children. For the past 2 years, Catalina has been in the agricultural business, farming rice in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 6,000 loan through NWTF to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Catalina has previously borrowed 6 times from NWTF to sustain her business. In the future, Catalina would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies

loans.name: Arnaldo Antonio

texts.es:
Arnaldo es un hombre de 55 años de edad, es un hombre que se desempeñaba como mayordomo en finca, profesión que cambio hasta el año 2013, cuando en base a unos conocimientos adquiridos de un amigo monto un taller de reparación de bicicletas, dado que el sueldo como mayordomo no daba abasto para mantener a su familia.

Arnaldo es padre de 5 hijos, a todos los ama y trata de apoyarlos todo lo que pueda.

Con el negocio ha venido mejorando, tienen une mejor calidad de vida y piensa seguir creciendo todo por el beneficio de su familia y propio, ahora quiere solicitar un aliento económico  que servirá para crecer y proyectar un sostenimiento por un tiempo más, ya que con el monto solicitado comprara repuestos de bicicletas, pero se centrara más en neumáticos que es la principal pieza que llega a su taller para reparar.
texts.en: Arnaldo is a 55 year old man. He worked as an overseer on a farm a profession that he changed in 2013 when thanks to the knowledge acquired from a friend he opened a bicycle repair shop.  His salary as an overseer wasn't sufficient to maintain his family. Arnaldo is the father of 5 children who he loves and tries to support them all that he can. With the business things are going better, he has a better standard of living and he is thinking of continuing to grow for his benefit and that of his family. He now wants to request an economic boost that will allow him to grow and sustain himself for a while. He will use the requested money to buy bike parts but concentrating more on tires, which is most often what comes to his shop to be repaired.

loans.use: to buy an assortment of bicycle parts.

loans.name: Linet's Group

texts.en:
Linet is 43 years old and has 6 children. She has been a farmer for more than 20 years and is always said to be a very hardworking individual. Even though Linet is the only one featured in the above picture, she is actually representing her group of 12 farmers in Kakamega North District, Kenya.

Linet decided to start working alongside One Acre Fund a few years ago, in 2011, because she wanted to have access to quality training and acquire new farming methods. Since then, she has seen her life improve, especially in the sense that she has learned a lot from farming trainings. This year she decided to represent her group because she wanted to gain leadership skills. Linet is also excited about purchasing a solar light since she will now be able to have somewhere to charge her phone.

Linet’s Group will receive farming inputs to plant a total of 6 acres of land and to buy 6 solar lights.

loans.use: to buy cost-efficient maize seeds and fertilizer for the coming harvesting season

loans.name: Pjeter

texts.en: This is Pjeter being photographed with his wife, Flora. They already have a dairy cow and want to add another one.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad is a 24-year-old married father of two children. He recently opened a bakery to cover the needs and expenses of his family. He is a hard worker and ambitious man who has a good reputation in his region. He is working hard to develop his business and satisfy his customers' requests.
Today, Mohammad is acquiring a Youth Loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to buy necessary ingredients like flour and olive oil to increase his production and attract more customers.
Mohammad hopes to expand his business in the future to increase his income and improve his living conditions.

loans.use: to buy necessary ingredients like flour and olive oil to increase his production

loans.name: Edilberto

texts.es:
Edilberto tiene 58 años de edad, vive en casa propia en el Caserío Playa Azul aproximadamente a 15 minutos del distrito de Pucará, una comunidad de clima caluroso, su población es amable y se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la provincia de Jaén que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

El se dedica a prestar servicio de transporte de pasajeros mediante su unidad vehicular, transportando a sus pasajeros a zonas aledañas a su distrito, cuenta con clientela fija, ha solicitado un préstamo para dar mantenimiento a su vehículo como limpieza del motor, arreglo de parachoques y de esta manera tener en buenas condiciones su unidad para seguir brindando este servicio, lo que le generará mayores ingresos que van a permitirle mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Edilberto is 58 years old and resides in his own home in the village of Playa Azul, which is approximately 15 minutes away from the District of Pucará. This community has a warm climate. The people are friendly and work in agriculture, trade, and livestock breeding. This area is situated in Jaén Province, which is in the region of Cajamarca in the northern mountains of Peru.

Edilberto offers transportation services to his passengers with the use of his vehicle. He transports people throughout the neighboring areas of his district. Edilberto has an established clientele. He is requesting a loan in order for him to perform maintenance on his vehicle, such as cleaning the engine and repairing the bumpers, so that his vehicle stays in good condition. This will allow him to continue offering his service so that he can generate more income to improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to pay for vehicle maintenance.

loans.name: Irshed

texts.en:
Irshed is a 19-year-old single man from a village near Jenin, where he lives with his family in a small house. Irshed has a farm in the village where he plants seasonal crops. It is a very good business and provides him with a good income.

Irshed took a USD loan from FATEN to help him to buy seeds and seedlings for his farm. This will increase his income and improve the family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy seeds and seedlings for his farm.

loans.name: Cesar Augusto

texts.es:
Siempre trabajador, humilde, correcto en sus negocios, buscando el mejor beneficio para su familia es la forma de ser de Cesar un criador de peces que lleva operando 10 años en el mercado.

Inicio el negocio por necesidad económica, pero también por querer tener un negocio propio, cansado de los bajos sueldos y de siempre trabajar por un mismo resultado, decidió buscar un camino y ahora se siente muy feliz de lo que ha logrado ya que al voltear a ver su familia nota un cambio considerable a comparación de cómo estaban antes.

Aunque han mejorado hay algo que no deja despegar al señor Cesar y es la falta de capital para invertir en su negocio por ello quiere solicitar un préstamo el cual invertirá en su totalidad en la compra de alimento, ya que si hay algo que caracteriza los peces de su tanque, es que son de buena calidad, y rico sabor.
texts.en:
Always hard-working, humble and up-right in his business he is looking for the best benefits for his family. This is Cesar's way of being. He is a fish farmer who has been in the market for 10 years. He started the business out of economic necessity but he also wanted to have his own business. He was tired of the low salaries and working in the same situation.

He decided to find his own way and now he is very pleased with what he has manged. He can look at his family and see a considerable change from how they were before. Although things have improved there is one thing that prevents Cesar from taking off and that is the lack of capital to invest in his business. So he wants to request a loan which he will invest in it's entirety in buying feed as if there is anything that characterizes the fish in his tanks, it is their good quality and great taste.

loans.use: to invest in it's entirety in food for fish.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To purchase ready-made women's clothes, perfumes and incenses to expand her business.

loans.name: Ayleen

texts.en:
Ayleen, 35 years old, is married and has three children who are in school. For the past year, Ayleen has been in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 6,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and other supplies to raise her livestock.

Ayleen has previously borrowed 3 times from NWTF to sustain her business. In the future, Ayleen would like to save enough money to afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed and other supplies to raise her livestock

loans.name: Oyimhol

texts.en:
Oyimhol is a 41-year-old resident of the Pyandzh region. She is involved in the sphere of crop cultivation. For 12 years of her life she has been doing this activity. Oyimhol copes well with her work. She is married and the mother of three children. Oyimhol's husband is engaged in agriculture.

Oyimhol is an honest and responsible woman. She loves to earn a living with honest labor. In this manner, she chose agriculture and her parents also were involved in this activity. Agriculture is the main source of income, because the income from this business supports the family. Oyimhol decided to take a loan and promote activities. With the loan received, she will buy mineral fertilizers and vegetable seeds. She is very reliable and will remain with the loan.

loans.use: to purchase mineral fertilizers and for vegetable seeds.

loans.name: Surayo

texts.ru: Сурайё 43 летняя жительница района Шахристон. Она замужем. Ее муж работает водителем. У нее четверо детей. Старший сын поступил в Государственный Медицинский Университет имени Авицены. Трое младших детей еще учатся в средней школе. Сурайё обратилась за кредитом, потому что хочет, чтобы ее сын получил высшее образование и осуществил свою мечту - стать врачом. Ее сын любит помогать людям, и он с самого детства выбрал свою профессию, и смело идет к своей мечте. Он поступил в Университет и теперь ему необходимо оплатить учебный год. Для Сурайё важно будущее своего ребенка и она всем сердцем надеется, что он станет хорошим врачом. Ее семья не богатая и не может оплатить за учебу сына и Сайёра обратилась за кредитом. Она заранее благодарит Вас за поддержку и понимания.
texts.en: Surayo is a 43-year-old resident of the Shahriston region. She is married. Her husband works as a driver. She has four children. Her eldest son enrolled in the State Medical University called Avitseni. The three younger children are still studying in secondary school. Surayo applied for a loan because she wants for her son to receive a higher education and to realize his dream - to become a doctor. Her son loves to help people, and chose his profession in childhood, and moves boldly toward his goal. He enrolled in the university and now he needs to pay tuition. Her son's future is important to Surayo and she wholeheartedly hopes that he will become a good doctor. Her family is not rich and cannot pay the son's tuition. Surayo applied for a loan. She is thankful in advance for the support and understanding.

loans.use: to pay her son's tuition at the Medical University.

loans.name: Fanny

texts.es:
Fanny tiene 42 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo e hijos en el distrito de Oyotún, una comunidad que se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Chiclayo, que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la crianza y comercialización de animales como gallos, gallinas, pollos, pavos, patos, entre otros, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en la parte posterior a su domicilio, se dedica a esta labor para apoyar con los gastos familiares, cuenta con experiencia en este negocio y con buenas referencias por parte de sus vecinos. Ha solicitado un préstamo para la compra de variedad de animales y alimentos balanceados para engorde de los mismos, esto le permitirá incrementar su nivel de ventas y por ende podrá tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Fanny is 42 years old and lives with her husband and children in the District of Oyotún. This community is known for agriculture, trade, and livestock breeding. It is located in Chiclayo Province, which is part of the region of Lambayeque on the northern coast of Peru.

Fanny raises and sells animals such as roosters, hens, chicks, turkeys, ducks, and other livestock. Her business is located behind her house. She does this work in order to help with the family expenses. Fanny has experience in this trade and also received good references from her neighbors. She is requesting a loan in order to buy a variety of animals and balanced feed so that she can fatten them. This will increase her sales levels, which will lead to a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a variety of animals and balanced feed.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy seed and seedlings for his farm.

loans.name: Felomina

texts.en:
Felomina is 53 years old, married, and has six children.

Felomina is in the agricultural business, farming rice in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 14,000 loan through NWTF to buy fertilizer and other farm supplies.

Felomina has been in this business for 22 years now, and has borrowed eight times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business.

In the future, Felomina would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and other farm supplies

loans.name: Gerson

texts.es:
Desde 1976 y gracias a las buenas enseñanzas de su padre el señor Gerson un campesino con una mentalidad ganadora viene desempeñando su trabajo como mayordomo en donde emplea 5 personas que le colaboran con el mantenimiento de las fincas.

El señor Gerson es un hombre casado, tiene 3 hijos menores de edad, los educa con una mentalidad de siempre superarse, asisten a la escuela y viven bien gracias a ese padre admirable con el que siempre cuentan incondicionalmente.

El señor Gerson busca sostenibilidad de su negocio, ser más reconocido para poder tener mayor número de contratos colaboradores e ingresos.

Gerson solicita un préstamo para el completar el dinero del pago de nómina de sus trabajadores, pues es una persona muy responsable que aunque no posee el capital por altibajos en su negocio, busca alternativas para siempre cumplir a cabalidad sus obligaciones.
texts.en: Since 1976 and thanks to the good teachings of his father, Gerson, a countryman with a striving mentality, has worked as a foreman where he employs five people to help him maintain farms. Gerson is a married man, with 3 dependent children. He is educating them with the mentality of always moving ahead. They go to school and live well thanks to this admirable father of whom they depend unconditionally. Gerson is looking for stability in his business, to be better known in order to have more contracts, helpers and income. Gerson is requesting a loan to complete the money he needs to pay for his workers' wages, because he is a very responsible person who does not have the capital due to the "ups and downs" in his business. He is looking for alternatives in order to always fulfill his duties.

loans.use: to pay for his workers' wages.

loans.name: Sandra Isabel

texts.es:
Sandra es una mujer del campo, luchadora, emprendedora, con buenas ideas, que inicio su negocio de cultivo por iniciativa propia con un pequeño terreno y como pueden ver en la foto es una empresaria que progresa, gracias al apoyo.

Ella no tiene hijos por lo que puede destinar gran parte de su atención al negocio, pero si tiene un hogar y unos padres que demandan su cariño y atención.

Sandra cultiva papayas, las cuales vende directamente en la plaza de mercado, en el momento su cultivo está en etapa de maduración y es aquí donde tiene que protegerlos por los diferentes depredadores y alimañas que roban sus frutas.

Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de riegos, pesticidas, fungicidas, insecticidas y larvicidas con el objetivo de proteger sus palos de frutas y poder aprovechar mejor el voluminoso cultivo que espera.
texts.en:
Sandra is a rural woman. She is hardworking, enterprising, and has good ideas. She began her cultivation business of her own initiative with a small field, as you can see in the photo. This businesswoman is progressing thanks to the support. 

She has no children so she can devote very much attention to her business but she has a home and parents who have her love and attention. 

Sandra grows papayas, which she sells directly in the marketplace. When the crop is in its ripening phase, she has to protect them from different predators and vermin who steal her fruits. 

She has requested a loan for the purchase of irrigation, pesticides, fungicides, insecticides, and larvicides in order to protect her ripening fruit in order to take advantage of the bountiful harvest she expects.

loans.use: to water and protect her ripening papayas from pests

loans.name: Catherine's Group

texts.en:
Pictured above is Catherine, often described as an extremely hard-working individual. She is 31 years old and, as a group leader, she is representing her group of 10 farmers in Kakamega North District, Kenya. She is married and has three children.

Catherine is returning this season to work with One Acre Fund to have access to quality training and to acquire new farming methods, which is why she decided to join in the first place. Catherine says that she is happy to have made that decision because, since she first joined in 2012, she has been able to consistently feed her family, which has improved her day-to-day life significantly. Catherine will also purchase a solar light which she is very excited about since she will now be able to have somewhere to charge her phone. Catherine will use the profits from this season to send her children to school.

The group will use this loan to purchase seed and fertilizer to plant a total of 5.75 acres and buy two solar lights.

loans.use: to purchase hybrid seed and fertilizer for the cultivation of maize

loans.name: Virgjinushe

texts.en: Virgjinushe, who was born deaf and mute, is a widowed mother of two children. She wants to use the loan to stock up on inventory items again for her little village grocery store.

loans.use: to stock up on inventory items for her little village grocery store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to build an extension that will be used as a kitchen.

loans.name: Sambath's Group

texts.en: Sambath’s group lives in a rural village in Phnom Penh province in Cambodia. Sambath makes a living cultivating rice and she also does extra work as tailor to support her family. In their village, there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and also save time by not collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for her family.

loans.name: Yangiboy

texts.ru:
Его зовут Янгибой. Ему 26 лет. У него не большая семья, состоящая из его жены и мамы. Мама и жена домохозяйки и Янгибой является единственным добытчиком. Он очень хочет иметь детей. Воспитывать их, учить и делать с ними уроки. Янгибой семейный человек. 
Янгибой в течение 5 лет занимается сельскохозяйственной деятельностью. В этом году Янгибой планирует посадить пшеницу. Для этого ему необходимо купить пшеницы, минеральных удобрений и горючего для трактора. Для сего этого нужны средства. Янгибоню не хватает не много денежных средств, и он надеется, что сможет получить не достающую сумму денег за счет кредита. Он заранее благодарит Вас за поддержку и помощь.
texts.en:
His name is Yangiboy. He is 26 years old. He has a small family, consisting of his wife and mother. His mother and wife are homemakers, and Yangiboy is the sole earner. He very much wants to have children, to educate them, to teach and do lessons with them. Yangiboy is a family man.

Over the course of five years, Yangiboy is engaged in agricultural activities. This year, Yangiboy plans to sow wheat. For this, he needs to buy wheat, mineral fertilizers and fuel for a tractor. For this, he needs money. Yangiboy does not have enough money and he hopes that he will be able to receive the needed sum through a loan. He gives thanks in advance for the support and help.

loans.use: to acquire wheat, mineral fertilizers and fuel for a tractor.

loans.name: Bahtiniso

texts.ru: Бахтинисо замужняя женщина. Она вместе семьей проживает в районе Пяндж. У нее трое детей. Бахтинисо 48 лет. Она занимается сельскохозяйственной деятельностью. Бахтинисо этой видом деятельности занимается около 6лет. В работе на земле в основном помогает муж и дети. Она готовится к вспашки земли. Бахтинисо имеет не большую часть земли, где она выращивает сельскохозяйственные культуры. Она готовиться к посеву нового урожая и по этой причине она обратилась за кредитом. За счет кредита она купить семян овощей, и минеральные удобрение для обработки земли. Взвешивание минеральные удобрение поможет ей получить качественный урожай. Бахтинисо очень важно Ваша поддержка.
texts.en: Bahtiniso is a married woman. She and her family reside in the Pyandzh region. She has three children. Bahtiniso is 48 years old. She is involved in agricultural activities. Bahtiniso has been involved in this type of activity for around six years. For working the land she is mainly helped by her husband and children. She is preparing to plow the land. Bahtiniso has a small plot of land, where she grows crops. She is preparing for the new crop and for this reason she applied for a loan. With the loan, she will buy vegetable seeds and mineral fertilizers for preparing the land. Using mineral fertilizers will help her to receive a quality crop. The support is very important for Bahtiniso.

loans.use: to buy vegetable seeds and mineral fertilizers.

loans.name: Dilafruz

texts.ru: Дилафруз 28 лет. Она из города Турсунзаде. Дилафруз в городе живет вместе мужем, сестренкой и свёкровью. Дилафруз активная и шустрая девушка. Она дома занимается шитьем женской одежды. Она берет на заказ одежды. У нее есть ученики, которые помогают ей в работе. В швейном деле ей нравится ежедневный доход. Сейчас Дилафруз хочет взять кредит, и за счет кредита она купить ткани и швейные принадлежности, чтобы не потерять источник дохода. С Вашей помощью Дилавруз хочет расширить деятельность и улучшить условия жизни семьи.
texts.en: Dilafruz is 28 years old. She is from the town of Tursun-zoda. Dilafruz lives in this town with her husband, sister and mother-in-law. Dilafruz is an active and smart young woman. She is involved in sewing women's clothing at home. She accepts clothing orders. She also has apprentices, who help her with the work. She likes the daily income in the sewing business. Now Dilafruz wants to obtain a loan to buy fabrics and clothing accessories in order to retain her income source. With Your help, Dilafruz wants to expand her business and improve her life.

loans.use: to buy fabrics and clothing accessories in order to retain her income source

loans.name: Muzaffara

texts.ru: На фотографии запечатлена женщина с именем Музаффара. Ей 49 лет. Она вместе с мужем и двумя сыновьями проживает на районе Масчох. Ее муж пенсионер, она работает уборщицей. Старшему сыну 24 года, он работает маляром. Младшему сыну 18 лет. Он учится в медицинском колледже. Он с самого раннего детства выбрал свой путь свою профессию. Он хочет помогать людям. Музаффара с семьей видит все старания сына, и хотят ему помочь. Так как учеба является платной и семья не в состоянии оплачивать его учебу. Музаффара не даст, чтобы сына отчислили с Университета. Музаффара взяла все в свои руки и обратилась за кредитом. Вся его семья будет работать, чтобы их сын смог получить образование. Музаффар надеется на Вашу помощь и заранее выражает Вам свою благодарность.
texts.en: This photograph depicts a woman by the name of Muzaffara. She is 49 years old. She, her husband and two sons live in the Mastchoh district. Her husband is retired, and she works as a janitor. Her oldest son is 24 years old, and he works as a painter. Her youngest son is 18 years old. He attends a medical college. He chose his path and profession in his early childhood. He wants to help people. Muzaffara and her family see her son's efforts and want to help him. Because he has to pay for his studies, and the family is unable to pay the tuition, Muzaffara cannot allow her son to be dismissed from the university. Muzaffara took matters into her own hands and requested a loan. The whole family will work hard to ensure that their son can complete his education. Muzaffara relies on Your help and expresses her gratitude to You in advance.

loans.use: to pay for her son's university tuition, so that he could obtain education and become a doctor

loans.name: Irene

texts.en:
Irene is a 53-year-old landlady from Kilifi, Kenya. She is a married mother of eight adults whose husband provides additional income.

irene has rental houses, a business she has been practicing for the last 10 years, earning sustainable income.

This marks her fifth time borrowing from VisionFund Kenya to finance her business after servicing the previous loans successfully. 

She will use the loan to purchase paint and renovate her rentals. The anticipated profit will be used to build more rentals and service her loan. She hopes to own several rentals in the future.

loans.use: to purchase paint and renovate her rentals

loans.name: Vorng's Group

texts.en: Vorng’s group lives in a rural village in Kandal province in Cambodia. Vorng makes a living cultivating rice and he also does extra work as tailor to support his family. In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these members to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time by not collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for his family.

Having a water filter at home will help each of these individuals to safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses, and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for his amily.

loans.name: Hosien

texts.en:
Hosien is a 30-year-old married man from Jabalia city. He lives with his wife and two kids in a small house. Hosien has a farm in the village which he plants with seasonal crops. It is a very good business and provides him with a good income.

Hosien took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy seeds and seedlings for his farm. This will increase his income and improve the family living conditions.

Hosien appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy seeds and seedlings for his farm.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a new sewing machine

loans.name: Gulnor

texts.ru:
Эту женщину на фотографии зовут Гулнор. Ей 52 года. У нее трое детей. Две дочки и сын. Сын Гулнор вместе с женой и детьми живет с ней. Гулнор обожает своих внуков и старается больше времени проводить с ними. 
    Гулнор на рынке занимается продажей зелени (укроб, петрушка, базилика...), также сухофруктов в зависимости от сезона. Сейчас весна больше на продажу идут свежие фрукты и овощи, в том числе и зелень. На данные момент она продает исключительно зелень. Чуть позже она вывозит на продажу и сухофрукты. Гулнор обратилась за кредитом, потому что хочет расширить деятельность и увеличить доход. На заемные деньги она приобретет зелень и сухофрукты. Поддержите Гулнор.
texts.en:
The woman in the photograph is called Gulnor. She is 52 years old. She has three children: two daughters and a son. Gulnor's son lives with his mother, along with his wife and children. Gulnor loves her grandchildren and tries to spend more time with them.

In the market, Gulnor sells herbs (dill, parsley, basil...), also dried fruit depending on the season. Now in the spring there are more fresh fruits and vegetables, including herbs. At the moment, she is selling exclusively herbs. A little later, she will sell also dried fruit. Gulnor applied for a loan, because she wants to expand activities and to increase income. With the borrowed money, she will acquire herbs and dried fruit.

loans.use: to purchase herbs and dried fruit for sale.

loans.name: Shoira

texts.ru: Шоира 21 летняя молодая девушка. Она замужем и пока не имеет детей. Шоира вместе семьей живет в городе Турсунзаде. Ее муж водитель такси. Сама Шоира в городе занимается земледелием. Шоира уже 3 года продвигает свою деятельность. Сейчас она готовить почву к новому посеву урожай. Шоира  в этом году хочет сажать огурцы и помидоры. Ей нужно семян огурцы и рассада помидора. Для покупки у нее нет денежных средств, по этой причине Шоира обратилась за кредитом. В будущем Шоира планирует расширить свою деятельность. Шоира верит в Вас и на Вашу помощь.
texts.en: Shoira is a 21-year-old young woman. She is married and still has no children. Shoira and her family live in the town of Tursunzade. Her husband is a taxi driver.  Shoira herself is involved in agriculture. Shoira has been pursuing these activities for three years. Now she is preparing the ground for the new crop planting. This year, Shoira wants to plant cucumbers and tomatoes. She needs cucumber seeds and tomato seedlings. She does not have enough money for the purchase, and for this manner Shoira applied for a loan. In the future, Shoira plans to expand her activities.

loans.use: to buy cucumber seeds and tomato seedlings.

loans.name: Lucille

texts.en:
Lucille is 32 years old and has four children. Lucille is married,, and two of her children are in school.

Lucille is in the agricultural business raising pigs in the Philippines. Lucille requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and other supplies to raise her livestock.

Lucille has been in this business for three years, and has borrowed three times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Lucille would like to save enough money to afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed and other supplies to raise her livestock

loans.name: Elisa

texts.en:
Elisa is 34 years old and has six children. Elisa is married and has four children who are in school.

Elisa is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. Elisa requested a PHP 6,000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her livestock.

Elisa has been in this for 2 years now, and has borrowed one time in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Elisa would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her livestock.

loans.name: Ainura

texts.ru: Айнура успешно погасила свой кредит, она благодарна Фонду Кива и всем, кто помог ей в финансировании. В хозяйстве есть 2 коровы, 2 бычка и лошадь. На 3,0 Га она выращивает клевер для реализации. На ежедневной основе она продает молоко. Ежемесячный доход Айнуры от сельскохозяйственной деятельности составляет 10,800 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Айнура обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 10,000 сом (KGS) для покупки овец с целью дальнейшего разведения и реализации. Она намерена развить свой бизнес, что непременно приведет к увеличению капитала семьи и позволит сделать дома ремонт.
texts.en: Ainura successfully repaid her loan and is grateful to the Kiva Fund and everyone, who has helped with the financing. Her farm contains 2 cows, 2 bulls and a horse. She grows clover for sale on 3.0 hectares of land. She sells milk on a daily basis. Ainura's monthly income from the agricultural business amounts to 10,800 som (KGS). To continue developing her business, Ainura requested a loan in the amount of 10,000 som (KGS) from the Bai-Tushum Bank to buy sheep for fattening up and subsequent resale. She intends to develop her business, which will certainly lead to increased income for her family and allow her to repair her house.

loans.use: to buy sheep for fattening up and subsequent resale

Siev makes a living cultivating rice and she also does extra work as tailor to support her family. In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. 

Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.name: Maria Margarita

texts.es: Margarita es una  señora casada, esta en la edad de 43 años, Margarita tiene 5 hijos que están en las edades de 10, 12, 15, 18, y 23 años, el esposo de Margarita se dedica a  trabajar de conserje una empresa, Margarita se dedica a la  crianza de ganado,  a la crianza de animales menores y trabaja al jornal de trabajos del campo, Margarita necesita el dinero del crédito para invertirlo en la compra de una vaca ya que comenta que por medio de la venta de la leche es como se puede ayudar en sus gastos sobre todo de sus 3 hijos que están estudiando, Margarita se vive con sus 5 hijos y una nieta de 1 años, Margarita dice que su felicidad es ver que sus hijos terminen sus estudios y lleguen a ser unos profesionales.
texts.en:
Margarita is a married woman. She is 43 years old, and she has 5 children who are 10, 12, 15, 18, and 23 years old. Margarita's husband works as a concierge for a business. Margarita makes a living raising cattle as well as small animals. She also performs field work as a day laborer.

Margarita is requesting a loan to buy a cow. She states that through milk sales she can help with expenses, especially since 3 of her children are in school. Margarita lives with her 5 children and a 1-year-old granddaughter. Margarita says that her dream is to see her children finish their studies and become professionals.

loans.use: to buy a cow.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy sodas and ingredients for preparing her fried dishes.

loans.name: Malika

texts.ru:
Малике 5 года. Она проживает на районе Спитамен вблизи города Худжанд. Малика мать двоих детей. Она не смогла получить высшее образование и надеется, что ее дети могут его получить. Она работает в столовой. Малика занимается всем, в том числе берет роль официантки и повара. 
 Причина обращения Малики за кредитом является ремонт дома. Она давно мечтала отремонтировать дом. Она планировала сделать ремонт еще до зимы. Денежные средства не позволили ей совершить задуманное, и ей причинило большие удобство холодный период года. Что избежать не удобств на следующий сезон Малина обратилась за кредитом, чтобы собрать не достающую сумму денег и отремонтировать свой дом.
texts.en:
Malika resides in the Spitamen region near the city of Khujand. Malika is the mother of two children. She was not able to get a higher education and hopes that her children can get one. She is working in a dining hall. Malika is engaged in everything from the role of waitress to cook.

Malika's reason for a loan is to repair her home. She has long dreamed of repairing her home. She had planned to make repairs before winter. Monetary resources did not allow her to carry out her plan, and it caused her a huge inconvenience during the cold period. To avoid the discomfort in the next season, Malika applied for a loan in order to collect the needed sum of money and to repair her home.

loans.use: to purchase building materials and repair her home.

texts.en:
Vat’s group lives in a rural village in the province of Phnom Penh in Cambodia. Vat makes a living cultivating rice, and she also does extra work as a tailor to support her family.
