In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses, and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for her family.

loans.name: Ibodat

texts.ru:
Ибодат 41 лет. Она замужем и имеет детей. Ибодат вместе семьей живет в городе Турсунзаде. Муж занимается таксистом. Старший сын женат. Невестка домохозяйка, она ведет домашнее хозяйство, и свободное время помогает маме в работе. 
Ибодат шьет "Курпа" и "курпача".  "Курпа" и "курпача"- это ватные матрасы. "Курпа" шьют стандартно квадратном размере, ее используют в качестве одеяла. Курпача длинные матрасы используется как диваны. Машараф около 5 лет занимается изготовлением "курпа" и "курпача". Ибодат около 6 лет занимается изготовлением "курпа" и "курпача". Ибодат просит кредит, для покупки новую швейную машинку модели "YAMATA". Это кредит поможет ей расширить деятельность.
texts.en:
Ibodat is 41 years old. She is married and has children. Ibodat lives with her family in the town of Tursunzade. Her husband is a taxi driver. Her elder son is married. Her daughter-in-law is a homemaker and she runs the domestic household and in her spare time helps her mama with the work.

Ibodat sews "kurpa" and "kurpacha", which are cotton mattresses. Kurpa are sewing in a standard square size and are used as blankets. Kurpacha are long mattresses used as sofas. For about six years, Ibodat has been preparing "kurpa" and "kurpacha". Ibodat is requesting a loan to buy a new sewing YAMATA machine. This loan will help her to expand her activities.

loans.use: to purchase a sewing machine of the YAMATA model and to expand the business.

loans.name: Berita's Group

texts.en:
Pictured above is Berita, who, as a group leader, is representing her group of eight farmers in Kakamega North District, Kenya. She is a married mother of three children, known by her community as a very hardworking individual.

Initially, Berita joined One Acre Fund in 2010 because she wanted to have access to quality training and acquire new farming methods. Since she joined the program she says that her life has improved, especially because she has been able to consistently feed her family. With the profits from the coming harvest season, Berita plans to send her children to school. She is also excited about the solar light which she will be receiving, since she will now have somewhere to charge her phone.

Between the eight farmers in Berita's Group, a total of 3.5 acres of land will be planted using the maize seeds and fertilizer received with the loan. In addition, the group will also receive a total of five solar lights between them.

loans.use: to purchase hybrid seeds and fertilizer to improve her maize harvest

loans.name: Kunthea's Group

texts.en:
Kunthea’s group live in a rural village in Phnom Penh province in Cambodia. Kunthea makes a living cultivating rice and she also does extra work as a tailor to support her family. 

In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.

loans.name: Pheap's Group

texts.en:
Pheap’s group live in a rural village in Battambang Province in Cambodia. Pheap makes a living cultivating rice to support his family. 

In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women and man safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses, and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for his family.

loans.name: Niginamo

texts.ru: Нигинамо благодарит Вас за помощь и поддержку. Ее бизнес значительно продвинулся вперед. Нигинамо привезла фрукты и овощи и сразу приступила к продаже. Нигинамо увеличила ассортимент продаваемого товара и сейчас большой сезон свежих сельскохозяйственных культур и основную часть ее товара занимает зелень и "чакка". Чакка-это таджикский домашний молочный продукт. Чакка как твердый йогурт без сахара. Нигинамо обратилась за повторным кредитом, чтобы привезти еще зелени и чакку на продажу. Она уверенна, что ее снова поддержат и заранее благодарит Вас.
texts.en: Niginamo is thankful for the help and support. Her business has significantly advanced. Niginamo transported fruits and vegetables and immediately proceeded selling them. Niginamo increased the range of goods for sale and now is the big season for fresh crops and the main part of her goods are herbs and "chakka". Chakka-is a homemade, Tajik dairy product. Chakka is like solid yogurt without sugar. Niginamo applied for a repeat loan in order to transport more herbs and chakka for sale. She is confident that she will get support again and gives her thanks in advance.

loans.use: to purchase seasonal fruits and vegetables and to boost sales.

loans.name: Sanginoy

texts.ru: Сангиной жительница района Шахринав. Ей 37 лет. Она замужем и мать троих детей. Муж занимается сельскохозяйственной деятельности. Сангиной занимается продажей конфеты, печенье, хлебы и напитки. У нее есть постоянные клиенты. Она хочет, привозит ассортимент товаров, и расширить торговли. Для завершения данной операции у нее нет денежных средств. Поэтому Сангиной обратилась за кредитом. Сангиной очень важно Ваша поддержка. Поддержите ее.
texts.en: Sanginoy is a resident of the Shahrinav district. She is 37 years old, married and a mother of three children. Her husband is involved in agricultural business. Sanginoy is involved in selling candies, cookies, bread and beverages. She has regular customers. She wants to bring in a selection of products and increase her sales, but does not have money to accomplish this. This is why Sanginoy requested a loan. Your support is very important for Sanginoy. Please support her.

loans.use: to buy a selection of products and increase her sales

loans.name: Celina

texts.es: Originaria de San Ramón, Matagalpa vino a Managua a buscar trabajo y se desempeñó en diversos puestos, cuando cumplió 40 años no encontró un trabajo estable que la sustentara en sus necesidades es por esta razón que decidió iniciar su propio negocio de pulpería. Para seguir surtiendo su negocio e incrementando sus ganancias Doña Celina solicita un crédito para comprar arroz, frijoles, papel higiénico, azúcar, aceite entre otros. De esta manera con las ganancias obtenidas podrá construir su propia casa y mejorar las condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Celina is originally from San Ramon, Matagalpa. She moved to Managua to look for work, and she performed a variety of jobs. However, she was not able to find a stable job that could support her needs. For this reason, when she turned 40, she decided to establish her own general store business.

In order to continue stocking her business and increasing her earnings, Celina is requesting a loan to buy rice, beans, toilet paper, sugar, and oil, among other things. With the income that she obtains, she hopes to build her own house and improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy rice, beans, toilet paper, sugar, and oil, among other things.

loans.name: Gulbahor

texts.ru:
Гулбахор верная жена и мать троих детей. Ей 37 лет. Ее муж на заработках в Российской Федерации. Она работает учительницей в средней школе. У учителей не большая заработная плата, но Гулбахор любит свою работу. Ей нравится заниматься с детьми и направлять их на нужные русла. Но Гулбахор понимает, что дети растут и им надо увеличить доход в семью, чтобы накопить денег для образования детей. 
  Гулбахор решила открыть магазин продуктов питания для животных и птиц. В Таджикистане, где 60% населения занимается сельскохозяйственной деятельностью, в том числе животноводством, этот бизнес будет вполне доходным. В данном бизнесе ей будет помогать ее сестренка. Гулбахон купила несколько мешков зерна, других кормов и уже вывезла на продажу, но ей необходимо еще больше товара. Для купли партии товаров она обратилась за кредитом.
texts.en:
Gulbahor is a loyal wife and mother of three children. She is 37 years old. Her husband works in the Russian Federation. She works as a secondary school teacher. Even though teachers do not have a high salary, Gulbahor loves her work. She likes to work with children and guide them in the right direction. Gulbahor also understands that because her children are growing, she needs to increase the income in the family in order to save money for the children's education.

Gulbahor decided to open a pet food store. In Tajikistan, where 60% of the population is involved in agriculture, including animal husbandry, this business will be quite profitable. Her sister will help her with this business. Gulbahor purchased several bags of grain and other food and already started her sales, but needs more merchandise. She requested a loan to buy an inventory of goods.

loans.use: to buy pet food and open her own pet food store

loans.name: Mushkiniso

texts.ru: Мушкинисо 42 летняя жительница не большого городка под названием Куляб. Народ Куляба славится своим не сравнительным стилем гостеприимства и чувство юмора. Мушкинисо мать четверых детей. У нее 2 сына и 2 дочки. Старший сын студент, младшие дети учатся в школе. Мушкинисо на рынке занимается продажей фруктов и самбусы. Самбуса - слоеные пирожки с мясной начинкой. Мушкинисо обратилось за кредитом, потому что хочет расширить деятельность и привезти новую партию свежих фруктов. Она верит, что ее поддержат, и она продвинет свой бизнес.
texts.en: Mushkiniso is a 42-year-old resident of a small town called Kulyab. The people of Kulyab are known for their comparative style of hospitality and sense of humor. Mushkiniso is the mother of four children. She has two sons and two daughters. Her elder son is a college student and the younger children are in school. Mushkiniso sells fruit and "sambusa" in the market. Sambusa is a puff pastry stuffed with meat. Mushkiniso applied for a loan, because she wants to expand activities and to transport a new parcel of fresh fruit. She believes that she will get support and put her business forward.

loans.use: to purchase and transport a parcel of fresh fruit for sale.

loans.name: John Carlos

texts.es:
John una persona alegre, sencilla, le gusta la cerveza, bailar, gozar la vida, un hombre soltero que solo vela por el cuidado de sus padres.

Se dedica a la compra y venta de ganado una actividad que ha desempeñado durante 15 años, tiempo en el cual se trazó un objetivo de comprar una vivienda y hasta el día de hoy sigue persiguiendo este sueño.

John tiene una preocupación, la cual la fuerte competencia que hay en el sector, por ello tiene que tomar medidas para no quedar atrás de la competencia.

Quiere solicitar un aliento económico para invertirlo en la compra de ganado bovino, el préstamo le permitirá tener mayor número de reces y darles a sus clientes la posibilidad de elegir cual le gusta más y negociar un precio en donde ambas partes queden satisfechas.
texts.en:
John is a happy simple person who likes beer, dancing and enjoying life. He is single and takes care of his parents on his own. He works buying and selling cattle, a business he has been involved in for 15 years. During this time he set a goal to buy a house and he is still pursuing this dream.

John has a concern which is the heavy competition in his sector. So he is taking steps to not fall behind the competition. He wants to request an economic boost to invest in buying cattle. The loan will allow him to have a greater number of animals and give his clients the opportunity to choose which they like most. And he can negotiate a price that leaves both parties satisfied.

loans.use: to buy cattle to become more competitive in the sector.

loans.name: Oun's Group

texts.en:
Oun’s group lives in a rural village in Battambang Province in Cambodia. Oun makes a living cultivating rice to support her family. 

In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these individuals safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses, and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for her family.

loans.name: Phorn's Group

texts.en:
Phorn’s group live in a rural village in Battambang Province in Cambodia. Phorn makes a living cultivating rice to support his family. 

In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help these group members safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses, and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for his family.

loans.name: Dalila Mercedes

texts.es:
Dalila tiene 43 años, es separada. Vive en casa familiar con sus 02 hijos, en una comunidad habitada por gente sencilla que se dedica al comercio, agricultura y ganadería que se encuentra ubicada en el distrito de Lagunas, provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú.

Ella se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales menores como patos, pavos, etc, desde hace 05 años se dedica a este negocio contando con experiencia y con buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. Necesita préstamo para invertir en la compra de una mayor cantidad de animales y comida para el engorde de estos, lo que le generará mayor ingreso diario a su unidad familiar y le va a permitir mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Dalila is 43 years old and separated from her spouse. She lives in her family’s home along with her two children. The community where she lives consists of modest people who engage in trade, agriculture, and livestock breeding. This area is located in the District of Lagunas in Chiclayo Province, which is part of the region of Lambayeque on the northern coast of Peru.

Dalila raises and sells small animals such as ducks, turkeys, and other livestock. She has five years of experience in this business and has also received good personal and work-related references from people in the area. Dalila needs a loan so that she can purchase a large quantity of animals and feed for fattening them. This will allow her to generate a better daily income for her family so that they can enjoy a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a large quantity of animals and feed.

loans.name: Rafoat

texts.ru:
Рафоату 64 лет. Она вместе с семьей проживает в маленьком городке Исфара. Рафоат учительница средней школы. Ей нравится заниматься с детьми и направлять их на правильную дорогу. Но в свободное от работы время Рафоат дома занимается шитьем курпы и курпачи. 
   "Курпа" и "курпача"- это ватные матрасы. "Курпа" шьют стандартно квадратном размере, ее используют в качестве одеяла. Курпача длинные матрасы используется как диваны. Она шьет их и продает. 
  Причина обращения за кредитом Рафоата является расширения швейной деятельности. На заемные деньги она собирается купить вату, ткани и швейные принадлежности. Рафоату очень важен этот кредит, и она надеется, что ее поддержат.
texts.en:
Rafoat is 64 years old. She lives with her family in the small town of Isfara. Rafoat is a high school teacher. She likes to work with the children and guide them on the right path. 

In her spare time, Rafoat works with sewing "kurpas" and "kurpachas". Kurpa and kurpacha are mattresses. Kurpas are sewn in a standard quadratic size, and is used as a blanket. Kurpachas are long mattresses used as sofas. Rafoat sews and sells them. 

The reason for Rafoat's loan is that she would like to expand her sewing business. For the borrowed money she will purchase wool, fabric and sewing supplies. This loan is very important to Rafoat and she hopes she will get support.

loans.use: to purchase fabric, wool and other sewing supplies

loans.name: Sayrambibi

texts.ru: Сайрамбиби 60 лет. Она проживает на районе А.Джоми. Сайрамби настоящая женщина дехканка. Она несмотря на свой возраст также активно занимается сельскохозяйственной деятельностью и в каждый свой посев она вкладывает свою душу. Сайрамбиби уже посеяла урожай и теперь необходимо купить минеральные удобрения для обработки земли. Но на надобное количество урожая у нее не хватает денег, и она видит выход из данного положения только в получении кредита. С минеральными удобрениями она не только посеет свой урожай, но сможет получить богатый и качественный урожай на следующий сезон.
texts.en: Sayrambibi is 60 years old. She lives in the A. Jomi region. Sayrambibi is a true farmer. In spite of her age, she keeps doing farm work actively and gives her all every planting season. She already completed planting and now needs to buy mineral fertilizers for treating her soil. However, Sayrambibi lacks the funds to purchase sufficient fertilizers, and she sees a loan as her only option. Thanks to the mineral fertilizers she will be able to have an abundant harvest of quality produce next season.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizers.

loans.name: Jose Joaquin

texts.es:
José es un hombre con un carácter templado, le gusta las cosas correctas, bien hechas, no le gusta la pereza y se esmera mucho por su familia tal y como le enseño su padre del cual heredo no solo su forma de ser, sino también sus conocimientos en el cultivo.

Inicio a la edad de los 14 años un terreno, iba ahorrando y a medida de que tenía más ingresos los invertía todos en su campo y hoy cuenta con buenas tierras.

Gracias a sus buenas habilidades para emprender, a sus terrenos, su responsabilidad, ha logrado sostener una familia grande, conformado por 6 hijos y aunque se separó de su esposa muy cumplidamente le da dinero cada semana para su alimento y estudio  de sus hijos.

José quiere seguir creciendo expandiéndose, mejorar cada día y es por ello que busca un apoyo crediticio el cual invertirá en la compra abono, riegos, semillas que son insumos para la preparación y cultivación.

Este apoyo ayudara a José a expandir sus cultivos para seguir generando una mejora continua de la calidad de vida de él y su familia.
texts.en:
José is a mild-mannered man who like things to be correct and done properly. He doesn’t like laziness and goes to a lot of effort to take care of his family. He learned this from his father, whose character he also inherited as well as his knowledge of agriculture.

At the age of 14 José started to work his land, saved money, and invested it all back in his farm. Now he has good farmland. Thanks to his skill in learning, his fields, his sense of responsibility, José has managed to support his large family of six children. Although he is separated from his wife, he  gives her a generous amount of money each week for food and for his children’s education.

He wishes to continue expanding and improving his lands so he is seeking a loan to buy manure, sprinklers, and seeds. These will help José grow his farm and continue improving his own and his family’s standard of living.

loans.use: buy agricultural supplies for his land (seeds, manure, sprinklers)

loans.name: Gjeline

texts.en: Gjeline is in the photograph with her husband Gjergj, or George in English. They want to build a fence around the animal stable and also in the backyard of their house.

loans.use: to build a fence around the animal stable and the backyard.

loans.name: Flor De Maria

texts.es:
Flor tiene 46 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene un hijo, vive con su familia en una zona rural del distrito de Oyotún que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. La vida en este distrito es tranquila y los pobladores se dedican a la agricultura, comercio y crianza de animales.

Ella se dedica a brindar los servicios de crianza y venta de animales, se dedica a esta actividad hace más 3 años contando con experiencia en este negocio y con buenas referencias por parte de sus vecinos. Con el préstamo construirá más corrales y comprará una mayor cantidad de animales para su negocio, dicha inversión le servirá para tener más animales para la venta y así poder atender las diversas necesidades de los clientes de la zona lo que le permitirá obtener mayores ingresos para mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
46-year old Flor is a single mother with a son. She lives with her family in a rural area in Oyotún district located in Chiclayo province, Lambayeque region, on Peru’s northern coast. It’s a tranquil place to live. The local people earn their living in agriculture, business, and animal raising.

Flor raises and sells animals, a job she’s had for three years. She has business experience and good references from her neighbours. With the loan she plans to build more pens and buy more animals. Then she will have more to sell and be better able to serve the various needs of her customers. More income will mean an improved standard of living for her and her family.

loans.use: build more pens and buy more animals

loans.name: Sophat's Group

texts.en:
Sophat’s group lives in a rural village in Kandal province in Cambodia. Sophat makes a living cultivating rice, and she also does extra work as a tailor to support her family.

In their village, there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses, and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for her family.

loans.name: Sayora

texts.ru: Её зовут Сайёра. Она живет в районе Вахш и ей 22 лет. Сайёра ответственная и трудолюбивая девушка. Муж Сайёры занимается таксистом. Сайёра 3 года назад начала заниматься земледелием. Ей научила заниматься ее отец. Сейчас она продвигает отцовскую деятельность. Она хорошо знает свою работу.  Сайёра обратилась за кредитом, чтобы купить семян арбуз и минеральных удобрений. Она обрабатывает почву с минеральными удобрениями, потом сажает урожай. Минеральные удобрения помогает получить качественный урожай. Из-за нехватки денег она обратилась за кредитом.
texts.en:
This is Sayora. She lives in the Vakhsh region and she is 22 years old. Sayora is a responsible and hardworking woman. Her husband works as a taxi driver. Sayora started working with field crop cultivation three years ago. She learned this from her father and now she continues her father's line of work. She knows this work well. 

Sayora applied for a loan in order to purchase watermelon seeds and mineral fertilizers. She processes the soil with fertilizer and then she plants the crops. The fertilizer helps her get a high quality harvest. Due to lack of money she applied for a loan.

loans.use: to purchase mineral fertilizers and watermelon seeds

loans.name: Nadera

texts.en:
Nadera is a 36-year-old married woman from a village near Tulkarm City. She lives with her husband and three kids in a small house. Her husband works as an employee in a local company. The family also has a farm in the village where they plant seasonal crops. It is a very good business and provides them with a good income.

Nadera took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help her to buy seeds and seedlings for the family farm. This will increase their income and improve the family's living conditions.

Nadera appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy seeds and seedlings for the family farm

loans.name: Abdel Majeed

texts.en:
Abdel Majeed is a 30-year-old married man from a village near Hebron city. He lives with his wife and two kids in a small house. 

Abdel has a farm in the village that he plants with seasonal crops. It is a very good business and provides him with a good income.

Abdel took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy seeds and seedlings for his farm. This will increase his income and improve the family living conditions.

Abdel appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy seeds and seedlings for his farm.

loans.name: Yến

texts.en:
Yến is 28 years old and she is married with two children. She lives and works in Quang Xuong district, a rural area in Thanh Hoa province.

Yến works in agriculture, farming poultry and cattle. She has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.

In 2014, Yến joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. She has successfully repaid one loan from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

The main hardship that Yến faces in her life is not having a hygeinic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, brick and equipment to build a toilet.

In the future, Yến hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, to build a new house, and for her business to do well.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, brick and equipment to build a toilet.

loans.name: Angelita

texts.en:
As a married parent of five children, Angelita works hard to support her family.

She has a buy-and-sell coconut business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from food vending. Angelita is borrowing PHP 7,000 through NWTF to buy more stock of coconuts for her buy-and-sell coconut business.

Angelita has been sustaining her business activities through her past two loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more stock of coconuts to sell.

loans.name: Phea's Group

texts.en: Phea’s group lives in a rural village in Prey Veng province in Cambodia. Phea makes a living cultivating rice and she also does extra work as a tailor to support her family. In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these people to safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for her family.

loans.name: Janepher's Group

texts.en:
Janepher is 49 years old and has six children. She has been a farmer for more than 20 years and is always said to be a very hardworking individual. Even though Janepher is the only one featured in the above picture, she is actually representing her group formed by 10 farmers in Kakamega North District, Kenya.

Janepher started working alongside One Acre Fund a few years ago, in 2011, and decided to do so because she wanted to have access to quality training and acquire new farming methods. Since then, she has seen her life improve; especially in the sense that she has learnt a lot from farming trainings ever since. This year she decided to represent her group because she wanted to be more active in her community.

Janepher’s Group will receive farming inputs to plant a total of 4.75 acres of land. Given that some members of the group will receive solar lights, a total of 3 solar lights will be received among them.

loans.use: to buy cost efficient maize seeds and fertilizer for the coming harvesting season.

loans.name: Sien's Group

texts.en:
Sien’s group lives in a rural village in Kandal province in Cambodia. Sien makes a living cultivating rice, and she also does extra work as a tailor to support her family.

In their village, there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses, and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for her family.

loans.name: Maria Elena

texts.es:
Ella es María es una mujer de 56 años de edad, separada de su esposo pero con muchas ganas y animo de demostrar que no necesita de nadie que la mantenga, ella con sus ahorros los cuales obtuvo empleándose en empresas, inicio un proyecto que falta pro culminar el cual será una salsamentaría que en pocas palabras es un lugar donde se puede ir a comprar productos de la canasta familiar, pero de igual forma puedes disfrutar una buena bebida, una cerveza, tinto, un aguardiente y música.

Lo que pueden ver en la foto es lo que ha logrado conseguir María, tiene alquilado un local, unas mesas y sillas, pero todo muy básico, le falta sonido, más mesas, una nevera, una vitrina, congelador y surtido en bebidas, y productos de la canasta familiar.

Ella solicita un préstamo el cual le puede ayudar a culminar su negocio para iniciar rápidamente, en el cual deposita su confianza y esperanzas de salir adelante y sabe que lo hará pues todo pondrá todo de ella para que funcione.
texts.en:
María is 56-years old, separated from her husband, but very willing to show that she doesn’t need anyone to provide her with support. With the savings she has from jobs in various companies, she has started a business but hasn't yet managed to get it up and running. She is planning to open a salsamentaría, a place where people can go to buy basic groceries but at the same time enjoy a drink, a beer, a glass of wine, a liqueur, and music.

The photo shows what María has been able to accomplish. She has rented a space, she has tables and chairs, but all is very basic. It lacks a sound system, enough tables, a refrigerator, a freezer, and stock.

María is seeking a loan to help her open her business as soon as possible. She is putting her faith and hope for a better future into this enterprise. She knows what she has to do because it all depends on her to work.

loans.use: buy tables, sound equipment, fridge, freezer, display cabinet, and stock (drinks and basic groceries)

loans.name: Sean's Group

texts.en:
Sean’s group lives in a rural village in Phnom Penh province in Cambodia. Sean makes a living cultivating rice, and she also does extra work as a tailor to support her family.

In their village, there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women and man to safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses, and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for her family.

loans.name: Elizabeth's Group

texts.en:
Pictured above is Elizabeth, who, as a group leader, is representing her group formed by eight farmers in Kakamega North District, Kenya. She is married and is the mother of two children, and is known by her community as a very experienced farmer.

Initially, Elizabeth joined One Acre Fund in 2011 because she wanted to get the best quality fertilizer and hybrid seeds. Since she joined the program she says that her life has improved, especially because she has been able to consistently feed her family. Elizabeth is also purchasing a solar light this year which she is so excited about because she will now be able to reduce the consumption of paraffin fuel, therefore saving more money. With the profits from the coming harvesting season, Elizabeth plans to send her children to school.

Between the eight farmers in Elizabeth's Group, a total of 3.75 acres of land will be planted using the maize seeds and fertilizer received with the loan. In addition, a total of 6 solar lights will be received between them.

loans.use: to purchase hybrid seeds and fertilizer to improve harvests of maize.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more flour to bake bread.

loans.name: Rasmeysakpheabrocheathibtey

texts.en:
Rasmeysakpheabrocheathibtey is 22 years old, a single freshman who is from the Kandal province in Cambodia. He is pursuing a bachelor’s degree, majoring in law at a university in the city. His father is a journalist and his mother is a homemaker. 

Rasmeysakpheabrocheathibtey has decided to take out a loan because he is short of the money to cover his university fees from the first to the fourth year. This loan will help him in earning a bachelor’s degree. 

After graduation, he dreams of having a proper job with a reasonable salary and he also wants to save money to build his own house.

loans.use: to cover his university fees from the first to the fourth year

loans.name: Adolat

texts.ru: Адолат 46 лет. Она жительница района Турсунзаде. Адолат замужем, и у нее двое детей. Один сын и одна дочка. Адолат и ее муж занимается сельскохозяйственной деятельности. Они выращивают помидоры. У нее есть рассада помидора. Адолат хочет, посадит рассадки помидора. Но вперед посадки ей нужно обработать почву с минеральными удобрениями. У Адолат нет денежных средств для купли достаточного количество минеральных удобрений, и по той причине она обратилась за кредитом.  Адолат будет очень рада за Вашу поддержку.
texts.en:
Adolat is 46 years old. She is a resident of the Tursun-zoda region. Adolat is married and has two children; one son and one daughter. Adolat and her husband work with field crop cultivation. They grow tomatoes. 

Adolat has tomato seedlings and would like to plant tomatoes. However, before the sowing she needs to process the soil with mineral fertilizers. Adolat does not have enough money to purchase a sufficient amount of fertilizer, and for this reason she applied for a loan. Adolat will be very happy for your help.

loans.use: to purchase mineral fertilizer

loans.name: Al Safadi Group

texts.en:
Joumana is the featured borrower for Al Safadi Group. She got together with her other group members to take this Al Majmoua loan because they have always been neighbors and friends. They are working hard to develop their businesses and living at the same time.

Joumana is a 47-year-old married mother of three children who has been selling clothes from her house since three years ago. She is a hard worker and sacrificing mother who is trying desperately to help her husband in covering the needs and expenses of their family.

Today, she is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to increase her business merchandise with a new collection of spring and summer clothes. This loan is very important to Joumana, for it will help her satisfy her customers' needs and expand her business later on in the future.

Joumana is the first lady on the right in the photo. With respect to the other group members, Zahra is the lady sitting in the middle, and Zainab is the first lady on the left.

loans.use: to increase her merchandise with a new collection of spring and summer clothes.

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es:
Juan Carlos tiene 50 años de edad, tiene hogar estable al lado de su cónyuge y tres menores hijos de 15, 9 y 6 años de edad, vive en casa propia de material rústico ubicada en el Distrito de Santo Tomás, una comunidad que se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Cutervo que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

El se dedica al cultivo de café, contando a la fecha con 1 has sembrado de la variedad catimore, junto con su esposa también se dedican a la crianza de animales menores en un corral ubicado en la parte posterior a su vivienda. Ha solicitado un préstamo para la compra de abono y fertilizantes para el mantenimiento de su cultivo de café y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos para su familia lo que le permitirá mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Juan Carlos is 50 years old. He has a stable home with his spouse and three dependent children aged 15, 9 and 6 years. 

He lives in his own house built of rustic materials and located in the district of Santo Tomas.  This is a community dedicated to agriculture, commerce and livestock. It is in the province of Cutervo, Cajamarca region, in the northern mountains of Peru. 

Juan Carlos grows coffee and has to date one hectare cultivated with the catimor variety. With his wife, they also raise small animals in a corral located behind their home. 

He is asking for a loan to purchase compost and fertilizers for his coffee crop. He's looking to increase his earnings and improve the quality of life for his family.

loans.use: to buy compost and fertilizers to maintain his coffee cultivation.

loans.name: Iringa Group

texts.en:
Anastazia, who is in her late twenties, is single with no kids. She has been running several projects, selling sodas, juice, water, and fruits and vegetables for two years now. She works from 10:00 a.m. to 10:00 p.m. daily and is able to make a fair monthly profit.

This will be Anastazia's fourth loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. She used the previous loans to keep on increasing her business stock and has paid all her loans successfully. She is happy with the loan and appreciates Kiva for their support. She used the profit to take care of herself, for loan repayment, and to cover household expenses.

She will use this loan to buy sodas, juice, fruits and vegetables, and to meet her customers’ demand. She dreams of making her business big.

Anastazia will share this loan with her loan group "Iringa", which consist of two members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy sodas, juice, fruits and vegetables, and to meet her customers' demand.

loans.name: Madina

texts.ru: Мадина добрая и отзывчивая девушка в возрасте 22 лет. Она пока еще не замужем. Мадина дома в течение 4 лет занимается шитьем одежды. Она сама выбрала свою профессию. За столь время она отлично научилась шить и самостоятельно берет заказы на шитье. Мадина училась шить и сейчас шьет на швейной машинке, которую Вы видите на фотографии. Мадина обратилась за кредитом, потому что хочет купить новую современную швейную машинку. От новой машинки зависит качество ее работы. Она хочет удержать старых клиентов и привлечь новых и для нее это покупка является очень важной. Поддержите Мадину.
texts.en:
Madina is a good and sympathetic woman at the age of 22 years. She is not yet married. Madina has worked with sewing clothing at home for a period of four years. She chose this profession herself. In this time she has learned well how to sew and takes orders for sewing by herself. 

Madina learned how to sew and currently sews on the sewing machine you can see in the photograph. She applied for a loan because she would like to purchase a new, modern sewing machine. The quality of her work depends on the new sewing machine. She would like to retain her older customers and attract new ones, and therefore this purchase is important to her. Please help Madina.

loans.use: to purchase a new, modern sewing machine
